name: Beachfront Tamariua (Costa Brava)
description:
A little paradise by the sea. Apartment 2/4 adults charming, bright and magnificent views of the Natural Park of Cap de Creus. Comfortable and tasteful. Splendid views. Located in the charming village of El Port de la Selva. Very near the beach.
HUTG 003688

The space
TAMARIUA a small paradise from the sea. Ideal couples. Apartment for 2 / 4 adults with plenty of charm, bright and with magnificent views of the Parc Natural Cap de Creus.
Apartment is located outside the village on a small hill in the middle of nature and the sea, 250 meters from central PORT DE LA SELVA, a small authentic village of fishermen, 20kms from France and 30km from Figueres.
Quiet and sunny with magnificent panoramic views over the sea and Pyrenees mountains. Just 3 minutes walk from the sandy beach of Cala Tamariua naturist, on the road to Cap de Creus. Good weather from April to October.

Comfortable and tasteful. It consists of a living room / dining room wi
neighborhood_overview: Apartment located outside the town on a small hill in the middle of nature and next to the sea, 250m from the center of the PORT DE LA SELVA, a small authentic fishing village. Quiet and sunny with magnificent panoramic views over the sea and the Pyrenees. Only 3 minutes walk from the Cala Tamariua sand naturist beach, on the road to Cap de Creus, and 50m from a small cove suitable for bathing and diving. Very close to the Nautical Port and the School. Shops, supermarkets, restaurants at 200 m.

name: 100m FROM THE BEACH, with TERRACE
description:
Big apartment with terrace (7 people), next to the sea and beach (2nd line, in López y Puigcerver Street at Avió Street). Area with restaurants and shops, in the Palamós center, a nice town in the middle of Costa Brava. Bus station is 5 minutes walking from the apartment.

The space
ONE MINUTE walking from the beach! (in Lopez i Puigcerver street)

It is on the first floor. There are four neighbors, two in each floor. Is a quite building!

It has three double bedrooms: one with 2 individual beds; another bedroom with a bunk (3 beds) and other double bedroom with a queen bed and bathroom ensuite.
In total, it has two bathrooms.
It’s for 7 people.
The apartment has got a big terrace, where you can eat or rest all the day under the sun. Or under the big sunshade... It's up to you!
The kitchen is full equipped (washing machine, fridge, microwave, oven).

name: 18th C Stone House near Costa Brava
description:
Casa Fluvia is a charming stone village house in a Catalan village on the Costa Brava just 5 km from the sea. A perfect base close to the beach to enjoy culture, cuisine, history, nature, and sports . Spacious house suitable for up to 8 people.

If your stay is less than 1 week, please request a price. It is difficult to cover all eventualities and lengths of stay with the automatic system. In July and August bookings run from Saturday to Saturday-

Tourist Registration Ref: HUTG 000207

The space
CASA FLUVIÀ IS A 18TH CENTURY STONE VILLAGE HOUSE WITH 3 DOUBLE BEDROOMS AND 1 TWIN BEDROOM.

- rooftop terrace and solarium
- first floor living area 30s Catalan style
- ground floor living area typical of 18th century stone farmhouse

The house is within 5 km of some of the best Costa Brava beaches, set in a quiet Mediterranean village in the Empordà with views of the Pyrenees, surrounding fields and neighbours wor
neighborhood_overview:
Torroella de Fluviá is a small peaceful rural village located a short drive from the beach (about 4 km). The immensely long beach of Sant Pere is famous for its beauty and (in designated areas) as a wind surfing, surfing, and kite surfing venue.

Sant Marti de Empuries offers a series of more protected coves adjacent to the Roman ruins of Empuries and the picturesque hamlet of Sant Marti.

Our house is a minute's walk from a great local shop. Fresh bread and newspapers in the morning, good local produce (including organic products) and most essential items. A village bar/restaurant in the town square offers great lunch options and small plates at all times. Or you can sit in the sun while the kids play safely.

The neighbouring village of Sant Pere Pescador offers a good range of shops including a largish supermarket. There are also restaurants for every pocket and taste in Sant Pere. See our guide book for some favourites.

Roads through the f
host_about: We have both been living in Barcelona for over 30 years and we met here in our adopted home. Girona and the Empordà are part of the attraction for us and we were very happy to be able to buy our beautiful village house in 2003. We are keen cyclists and get in some Touring every year in Ireland, France, and Spain. Our other passions are wine and food and having a place near the French border has allowed us to get to know the wonders of the wines of the south of France (Languedoc Rousillon). We like to travel simply so Airbnb is a perfect solution and we have been hosting on Airbnb and elsewhere for over 10 years with great results, meeting interesting people for all over the world.

name: Begur, house w/garden & pool, view to sea & castle
description:
200sqm house with garage, private garden and shared pool.
5 mn walking from Begur centre and some 3 kms from the various beaches and calas. Gorgeous views to the Medes islands and Castle from everywhere in the house. At the entrance level, a very nice suite with its private bathroom, and 2 large doublerooms with 2nd bathroom with same views. At the garden level, large livingroom with bar and its 28sqm porch. Opened kitchen with cellar. Guests toilets.

The space
Our house is perfect for relaxing and enjoying Begur Cape, its landscapes and varied activities (beaches, walks, cultural patrimony, nautic sports, golf...). Views over the sea, the Medes islands, as well as over the Begur village and its Castle are beautiful , and invite to relaxation while keeping you connected to these exceptionnal surroundings.

Guest access
We rent the entire house, except a closed zone at the ground floor not included in the above description.
The swi
neighborhood_overview:
Close to Begur you'll be free to choose between the long Pals sand beach and the many beaches and calas of the Begur Cape (Sa Riera, SaTuna, Fornells, Aiguablava, ...) which are amongst the most beautiful of the Costa Brava. We recommend as well to explore the pathways that link them.
Diving (various marine reserves), nautic sports, tennis and various golf courses (one PGA) are available close by.
Gastronomy quality of the area is well known, and you'll find a large variety of restaurants in Begur and its surroundings.

name: Luxurious Villa in La Costa Brava
description:
The space
Located in the heart of S'Agaró and annexed to one of the most exclusive area in La Costa Brava: La Gavina. It combines the tranquility of a residential area with the proximity to a very fashionable center of leisure in the Coast of Gerona (Playa de Aro).

With spacious rooms and a warm inviting decor, the Mas Sais Villa stands out for its 3 Suites with individual bathroom totally new for the best comfort of its guests. It has a large kitchen fully equipped Mediterranean style that binds to a nice, bright dining room and meeting place to share. It also has a spacious lounge with two areas and a large fireplace ready to use.

The private garden consists of a beautiful travertine pool with night lighting where you could cool off. Also a hammock hanging between two trees shade on a blanket of lawn for romantics. Certainly its unique marble porch with comfortable wicker sofas will make guests enjoy the wonders of the Costa Brava.

name: Most beautiful holiday with or without guide.
description:
Hiking, biking or enjoy culture on the Costa Brava with host family.
Everything you need for an unforgettable holiday: varied walks or bike rides, detailed city walks, with or without guidance.

The space
My wife and I regularly go to our apartment in Ampuriabrava, known as the Venice of Spain on the Costa Brava. As avid hiking, cycling and culture lovers we have collected an enormous amount of information on the Costa Brava: detailed town walks, informative guides about museums and especially some 130 walks and a number of cycling trips. We have discovered over the years that the Costa Brava has much more to offer than beach and sun. That's why we started the formula host family to explore this unprecedented Spain at an affordable price.

Guest access
Common areas are the bathroom with toilet and living room.
In the bedroom are washing facilities (a sink) present.

Other things to note
For an additional compen

In the neighbourhood there is a nature reserve and an airport for parachutists. The village includes 42 km. navigable canals.

name: Costa Brava, 50 m from beach 1
description:
Apartment in a quiet street in the center of Sant Antoni de Calonge, 50 meters from beach
3 bedrooms (2 double, 1 with bunk bed)
2 bathrooms with shower
Living room with balcony
Satellite TV, Internet WiFi
2 balconies
Private parking for 1 car

The space
Sant Antoni combines a rich medieval history with modern day facilities, offering an ideal place to relax, either on the beach or in the mountains. It lies 2 km away from Palamós, along the seashore path, offering the visitor exceptional views of our coasts.

The beautiful winding path along the "Camino de Ronda", will also take you to Playa de Aro. During the walk, you will be able to sit down and rest on any of the terraces and enjoy the sunshine, even during the winter months.

The apartment is:

In a residential building in a quiet street in the center of Sant Antoni de Calonge, one row of houses behind the seafront. 50 meters from the beach
neighborhood_overview:
Shops, supermarkets, restaurants, sea sports rentals, all within 10 minutes walk from the apartment.

Sant Antoni combines a rich medieval history with modern day facilities, offering an ideal place to relax, either on the beach or in the mountains. It lies 2 km away from Palamós, along the seashore path, offering the visitor exceptional views of our coasts.

The beautiful winding path along the "Camino de Ronda", will also take you to Playa de Aro. During the walk, you will be able to sit down and rest on any of the terraces and enjoy the sunshine, even during the winter months.
host_about:
Hello,

We are a family who own a number of apartments and houses
-  Costa Brava, Spain (town of Sant Antoni de Calonge and town of Palamos)

We speak fluent English, French, Danish, Spanish, Catalan, German and Mandarin Chinese.

My father is a diplomat, so we have lived and traveled extensively around the world. We enjoy meeting travelers and try our best to make your stay as enjoyable as possible.

We have contracted cleaning and maintenance staff, available to solve any issue that may come up during your stay, as soon as possible.

Generally Ana (in Spain) will be the ones to meet you at the property and provide tips about the area (she can advise on activities, restaurants, shops...). 

We enjoy good food and wine, sailing (and may be able to take you out on a boat trip locally depending on the dates of your visit), scuba diving, skiing, go-karting, adventure sports in general, entrepreneurial ventures, football, art and architecture, handicrafts etc.

name: apartment with countryside views
description:
Open plan apartment. Part of a restored Catalan farmhouse. Panoramic views in the heart of the countryside. Close by to Besalú, medieval village, and well placed for many different and interesting excursions.

The space
Apartment for up to 4 people with kitchen/dining/sitting room, and bathroom with shower, contains a mezzanine with two double beds.
Rural views. Situated between the volcanic park of the Garrotxa, and the mediterranean sea. Allowing for many different excursions. 3 km from Besalú, a well preserved medieval village with all amenities.
In the grounds of the house there's a swimming pool and children's playground with table tennis, 'futbolin' and at the bottom of the garden a zip wire swing. In the summer there's a mall rural campsite in the grounds,
which share the facilities. Also, the bar and restaurant are open ( July and August). Friendly atmosphere.

Guest access
The apartment is independent, has it's own f

name: Quiet times by the riverside
description:
Stay in a historical building! Right in the Old Town, you will have shops, restaurants and walks literally round the corner. Very quiet, with wide views on the river. Parking is about 5 minutes walk. Long stays welcome. No late arrival fees.

The space
Days for a great break in the historical centre of a small pretty city!
The apartment is in the heart of the old town, on a privileged location: right in front of the riverside. So you'll see the birds fishing in the morning, and the sun sets will just be yours, on a huge 4 meters wide window on the river.
In addition to the views, the silence is one of the pros of the apartment; the river is very quiet, and as I live on the apartment below your you won't have parties every night (or you'll be one in it! :) )
The place has one big room; on one side the bed, very comfortable and wide, and on the other the sofa-bed and the computer. It doesn't feel small as the ceiling is very high, and a nice (sort of
neighborhood_overview: I believe we live in one of the best places in the world. It has the advantages of a city, but actually is is still a town- in the good way! Iis a lively area with many places to visit, shops, or simply walk around. I specially love the gardens around the city wall, 10 minutes from here. I deeply appreciate that cars are restricted in the area.
host_about:
I am someone who likes very different things, you will see. Let's start: I was born in a small town in l'Empordà, called Torroella de Montgrí. Those were also a mixture of happy and wild times, a bit like Amarcord from Fellini (watch it if you haven't).
Then I studied computer science in Barcelona, and a PhD with a part of it in London, about medical imaging.
In between something entered my life, for good: yoga: I started practicing and soon I was so pationated then when I finished my PhD it was obvious that becoming a teaching would be the best choice of my life.
So I practice yoga every day, and also: I love music, and I play myself the accordeon and the clarinet. Just as an amateur, but the pleasure of making music is amazing. I also like dancing, folk music and lately also Lindy Hop (Girona has a few places to dance if you are into it).
I like eating well and healthy. Not to much meat (I am sorry for those creatures we kill but sometimes it comes and I eat).
I like travelling, in all wild ways, but I am not a traveller that can tell thousands things! I participate as well in the couchsurfing project, from time to time- and when there isn't already someone at my place, a friend or a friend of a friend.
The apartment I rent, Girona Riverside, was planned to be for me as another floor was ment to be the yoga studio. However now I have another, bigger, place for yoga and I rent it. I hope you like it!
As a buddhist (if I can call myself that which I don't know) my motto would be to understand the sources of suffering, and enjoy immediate happyness.
Hola!Soy David!Soy profesor de yoga y os invito a una estancia estupenda en el centro de Girona en un apartamento con unas increibles vistas al rio!Naturaleza y silencio para tu felicidad!

neighborhood_overview:
The house is located a 10 minutes from de beach, but at the same time quiet and close to everything.
Less than 5 minutes walking, you will reach the commercial street with another big supermarket, excellents shops where you can find fresh fish, perfumes, clothes, gifts and much more.
10 minutes away there is the eldest part of town, the walled city of “Vila Vella”. A really beautiful place.


Tossa is a beautiful and quiet town, with a lot of charm. Ideal to travel with your couple, family or with the kids.
It is one of the most beautiful town in all Costa Brava, where you can steel feel the little old town atmosphere and where is not allowed to build tall buildings.
Besides enjoying the beaches, there are a lot other things to do. For example: walk around the old and narrow streets from the walled town "Vila Vella", go the the lighthouse and relax at the "Bar del Far", while you enjoy the incredible views of the rugged coastline and the cliffs. Walk
host_about:
We are Ana and Kristjàn and we’ve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Let’s Holidays.

The passion with which we’ve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you. 
That’s where our philosophy comes from. We like to chat and we will try to get you anything that you need and find solutions to anything that you propose.

At the end, holidays should be exactly the way we want them, right?

We present some of our services :)

The Home Selector is the person who will help you choose the option most appropriate to your tastes. You will save time in searching and finding the best choice.

The Host is the person who will take care of you during the whole stay and try to find anything that you need with the help of the other hosts.

Let’s Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.

We’ll love to meet you!

See you soon ;)

host_about:
Hola, hola!

I am Gary. 
I like Spain and it's culture with interesting traditions. 
My favorite region here is Costa Brava with small nice city Sant Feliu de Guixols.

I love introducing people to this amazing city. And whenever i have the opportunity i love discovering new places and great people.

You should stay in Sant Feliu de Guixols because:

And many, many, many other reasons!

name: Together w family·friends in cozy apartment-lofts!
description:
Organize a holiday reunion together with family members or friends. We have 3 apartments for an independent stay use with central-heating for 3 fam. or 13 'pers. You can apart hire an extra separate large room having a wood stove celebrating a party.

The space
Can Banal is a former Catalan farmhouse called "masía" from the XVI century. Since 1987 it has been our home and camping business. Since 2012 we have been able to open up 3 holiday apartments on the upper floor that can be rented all 3 together for a group, specially 3 or 4 families "together but not mixed". The apartments can accommodate 3 '- 5' - 6 '= 14 persons in total. Besides there is a large room, beware rather rustic style, for a party event. We rent it out apart including a simple kitchen, wood stove with firewood and music-equipment. Consult us the price.

The apartments are independent multi space rooms containing bedroom, kitchen with dining area and bathroom. All have central heating
neighborhood_overview:
Can Banal is situated in the beginning of the Catalan Pyrenees, in a region called “Alta Garrotxa”. Located midway between the sea-shore (45 min) and the high mountains of the Pyrenees (1h) makes it possible for many types of day-trips.
Close to many interesting places of cultural, natural or gourmet aspects like Castelfullit de la Roca, Besalu, the Garrotxa Volcanic Park or Olot.
Within a 6 km drive, Sadernes is reached from where the wonderful trekking path towards Sant Aniol d'Aguja starts.

The landscape around Can Banal is peaceful and rural, with rivers and forests that changes colors depending on the season. In autumn there are varieties of mushrooms and in spring many types of orchids and butterflies to enjoy.

If you just decides to stay around in Can Banal you'll find enough to do for few days. Walk our own signed trails along water creeks, fields, forests, hermitage, farms and villages round us. We have mountain bike’s to rent and in a 25' walk
host_about:
Hola, we are Stendert & Maria

We live in Mas Can Banal for many years. Stendert, born '51, originally is from Breda-Holland, and Maria, born '66, is from Stockholm-Sweden, where her parents once had arrived from Spain. We enjoy very much living here in the countryside surrounded by hills, forests, and rivers. Halfway to the sea and to the high mountains.

We are accompanied by our daughter Saskia born '02 and Stendert's son - Luuk, born  '93, who works in our village and in their spare time help us.

Our professions are of the most diverse; Maria studied interior design and artistic glass techniques and Stendert studied to become a tropical agronomist and later carpentry. Probably this multifaceted mixture connects us with many diverse interests and activities, especially the maintenance of CB with its forest, animals, and agro-tourism.

We hope to be able to combine these aspects of us and make your stay as pleasant and memorable as possible. Together, we speak 7 European languages and understand a few more. We like very much to tell you about our favorite places, help you out for more personal advice and add if there is a special event going on.

  Welcome·Bienvenidos·Welkom·Benvinguts·Välmommen·Bienvenue·Willkommen

Hola somos Maria and Stendert

Vivimos en Mas Can Banal desde hace muchos años. Stendert, nacido '51, originario de Breda , Holanda y María, nacida '66, de Estocolmo- Suecia , donde sus padres una vez llegaron desde España . Nos gusta mucho vivir aquí en el campo, rodeado de colinas, bosques y ríos. A mitad de camino hacia el mar y la mitad del camino a las altas montañas.

Nos acompaña nuestra hija Saskia, nacida '02 y Luuk, hijo de Stendert,  nacido en el '93, que trabaja en nuestro pueblo. Ambos en sus ratos libres nos ayudan en diferentes tareas.

Nuestras profesiones son de la más diversa; María estudió diseño de interiores y técnicas de vidrio artístico y Stendert estudió para ser ingeniero agrónomo tropical y mas tarde carpintería. Probablemente esta mezcla multifacética , nos conecta con muchos diversos intereses y actividades, en especial el mantenimiento de CB con su bosque, los animales y el agroturismo.

Esperamos ser capaces de combinar estos aspectos de nosotros y como hacer que su estancia sea lo más agradable y memorable como sea posible. En conjunto, se habla 7 idiomas europeos y entender algunos pocos más. Nos gusta mucho que decir acerca de nuestros lugares favoritos, ayudará a cabo el asesoramiento más personal y añadir si hay un evento especial ocurre.

name: Unique cosy holiday paradise, in nature!
description:
A very pretty and cosy holiday home with a lot of character, beautiful views and loads of peace and quiet and the prettiest sunsets!
The perfect place to fully disconnect and enjoy nature, yet only 10 minutes from the village and at a 20 minutes distance from the beach...! At a short distance from Impressive Girona and bustling Barcelona, a perfect base to explore the incredibly beautiful Costa Brava área! And....we have the best suggestions to fully enjoy your stay! Caulès is a smoke free area!

The space
Visiting the Costa Brava? Or planning to visit Barcelona of historic Girona? Come and stay in our very beautiful and romantic "Petit Caules" the converted stables of our 15th century (once) farmhouse in the Massis de Cadiretes natural park.
The view on the hills is incredible. You can relax in the swimmingpool, which is set in the garden behind the house, surrounded by trees so very secluded!

Petit Caulès has a large, "panorama view" livin
neighborhood_overview:
Georgeous beaches and bays 25 minutes, an incredible view on Montseny mountain,
Impressive Girona 30 minutes, romantic medieval villages all around! Spectacular Barcelona 50 minutes (also by train!) Plenty to discover along the worldfamous breathtaking Costa Brava coastline and inland. I will be happy to suggest daytrips as I am a tourist Guide as well.

The village of Vidreres 10 minutes, Tossa de Mar 20 minutes as well as Lloret de Mar 20 minutes. France only 1 hour.

name: Villalloret -vista mar, piscina privada,rural, Bbq
description:
Casa estilo rural vista mar, con piscina privada, barbacoa, huerto, estanque con peces, gran jardín con mucha vegetación, terraza con espectaculares vistas, parking privado, y equipada con todo lo necesario para disfrutar en familia de un entorno seguro, rodeado de tranquilidad, relax y belleza natural.
VILLALLORET es más que una experiencia de naturaleza, rodeados de vegetación despertarse con el trinar de los pájaros, atardeceres soleados donde reina la paz con fragancias de madreselva.

The space
Preciosa casa estilo rural con piscina privada de agua salada, gran jardín y terraza con espectaculares vistas al mar y con espectacular jardín lleno de vegetación.
Se alquila toda la planta baja con amplio jardín de 1700 m2. hay gallinas, estanque con cascada natural y peces y un gato.
Ambiente ideal para familias con niños, entorno natural con bellas vistas al mar, a 5 minutos del pueblo y playa, se recomienda coche.
Amplio dormitorio c
neighborhood_overview: Situada en una urbanización tranquila, en la falda de una colina con vistas al mar y  rodeada de naturaleza,  donde viven vecinos del pueblo todo el año, a 5 minutos en coche de supermercados,  centro y playas.
host_about:
Hola, somos Manolo e Isabel, 
Desde Villalloret queremos  darles  la bienvenida. Este alojamiento que en principio nació para uso personal, para albergar reuniones familiares y vivir momentos únicos con familia y amigos, fue decorado con todo amor, por eso está lleno de pequeños toques con  sabor rural, para  los que utilizamos útiles de labranza propiedad de la familia.
Tiempo después vimos que por la dinámica de la vida diaria  no podíamos hacer uso de él y disfrutarlo nada más que en determinadas ocasiones,  y así fue como decidimos ponerlo a disposición para que otras familias pudieran disfrutarlo y pasar aquí  su tiempo de vacaciones, e incluso teletrabajar si este fuera su caso. 
Por eso nos  encantaría que pudieran conocer la Costa Brava desde  una perspectiva diferente, combinando el sabor de antaño, con lo actual, combinando el mar y la montaña, en un espacio para evadirse y reencontrarse con la naturaleza y con un ritmo más lento en su vida diaria más auténtico y sostenible. Pero a  la vez y cercano a lo urbano, a lugares de ocio y a las mejores playas de la costa Brava

name: Beautiful house with spectacular views
description:
Beautiful house with spectacular views of the bay of El Port de la Selva, on the Costa Brava, and steps away from the Natural Reserve of Cap de Creus.
Sleeps 7 people and is 5 minutes by car from the village and beaches, also reachable by foot.

(HUTG-017508)

The space
Located in the charming fishing village of El Port de la Selva, on the Costa Brava, "Giraluna" is a beautiful rustic-style villa with lots of character. It is situated among pine trees on the top of a hillside and enjoys spectacular views over the village, the bay and the mountains. The location is very tranquil, just 30 meters from the entrance to the protected reserve of the Natural Park of Cap de Creus, though very close to the centre of the village and the beaches, easily accessible by car and on foot.

"Giraluna" has a capacity for seven people distributed between 3 double bedrooms with their respective bathrooms, two with panoramic views. The kitchen is well equipped

I invite you to enjoy all this from our house in El Port de la Selva, a charming fishing village, where we have spent our summers for the last 20 years. I promise you will want to come back!

name: Cozy apartment with views, terrace & parking
description:
Casa ANNIE is a house / apartment (50m2) with capacity for families / couples (2 adults and 2 children), located in a private urbanization, less than 5 minutes by car from the center of Lloret de Mar. The price includes a private parking and internet connection by wifi. Just 30 meters from the house there is a communal pool (with sink, shower, benches, parasols, sun loungers and natural grass)

The space
Casa ANNIE is a house / apartment (50m2) with capacity for families / couples (2 adults and 2 children), located in a private urbanization, less than 5 minutes by car from the center of Lloret de Mar. The price includes a private parking and internet connection by wifi. Just 30 meters from the house there is a communal pool (with sink, shower, benches, parasols, sun loungers and natural grass) that is cared for daily by a gardener. In the surroundings of the house there are several beaches to which you can walk, but by car it is more recommended. About 200 meters
neighborhood_overview: sin registro
host_about:
¡Hola, bienvenidos a nuestro perfil en Airbnb!

Nos hemos decidido a alquilar nuestra casa en Lloret de Mar, porque no la usamos lo suficiente, y dado que nos encanta viajar y apreciamos las numerosas oportunidades que ofrece el portal Airbnb, nosotros también lo utilizamos como huéspedes, nos gustaría poder ofrecer a los demás viajeros que conozcan esta bonita zona de la Costa Brava: ciudades costeras tan famosas como Lloret de Mar (5 min. en coche), que te ofrece un sinfín de posibilidades de diversión y buena comida, la ciudad medieval de Tossa de Mar (15 min. en coche), con su famoso castillo, o Blanes (15 minutos en coche) con sus famosas fiestas con fuegos artificiales. Nuestra casa está rodeada de muchas e increíbles playas como Canyelles, o la playa Llevadó, sin olvidar la playa de Santa Cristina, por citar algunos ejemplos. 

Nuestro deseo es que te sientas como en tu propia casa, y por eso hemos pensado en ofrecerte todo lo necesario para una estancia cómoda, lo más acogedora posible y que te lleves un bonito recuerdo. En nuestra casa encontrarás el relax y la tranquilidad que estás buscando, y podrás refrescarte en los días de calor en la maravillosa piscina de la urbanización. Estamos siempre a tu disposición para cualquier consulta, incidencia o sugerencia que surja durante tu viaje y estancia. Además, nos encantará ofrecerte recomendaciones e ideas sobre cómo pasártelo bien. 

Un abrazo, Ady y David

The house has 3 big doublerooms, and 2 small childrens' room. It has 2 toilettes, one in every floor.

It is fully equipped.

description:

The space
La casa consta de dos plantas, la entrada tiene espacio para dejar un coche y otro en el garaje cerrado propio.
En esta planta salón comedor muy amplio, baño de cortesía, cocina espaciosa con salida al jardín y el garage.
En la planta superior, 4 habitaciones: 1 habitación suite con cama de matrimonio y baño propio, además de terraza propia, 1 habitación con cama matrimonio, 1 habitación con dos camas individuales y 1 habitación abierta que puede usarse de despacho, zona de juegos, habitación auxiliar…posibilidad de 2 camas más.
En esta misma planta baño con ducha y baño con bañera en suite.

Guest access

Hello, welcome to Costa Brava, welcome to Catalonia and welcome to L'Escala.

name: LA CASA NOVA - Mas with much comfort
description:
The space
The house is a detached stone house near the village Pontós. The farmhouse is situated at 145m altitude and offers a beautiful view out over the valley towards the sea to the east and south. To the north and west, you got the view of the Pyrenees Mountains and its foothills. It is just 20 minutes drive away from the spectacular beaches and coves of the Costa Brava, 15 km from the towns of Figueres where the Dali Museum is situated, from Banyoles with its large lake, and 25 km from Girona with its very attractive old town. Barcelona is situated 130 km south and by car, but also by train, well and quickly accessible.

The farmhouse was built in 1640 on the site of a former Iberian settlement. The house is detached and surrounded by fields and forest. The nature begins thus directly outside the front door. It was renovated very loving and with natural materials. Itoffers all the comforts of a modern home and a homely atmosphere. The large garden, the archi

neighborhood_overview:
L'Escala has a strategic location - everything is close. Girona, Roses, Cadaques - only 40-45 min; Figueres and Empuriabrava - 20min; Begur and Palamos - 30 min; Pals and Playa de Aro - 40 -50 min; Banyoles, Olot - 40 min - 1 hour. Overall, L'Escala is perfect for exploring the Costa Brava.
L´Escala offers various activities and areas which can be enjoyed with children. The beaches of L´Escala are characterised by their fine sand and shallow waters, which means that they are ideal for children. Also is a paradise for children, with children´s parks, go-karts and horse trip, as well as bicycle hire. What´s more, L´Escala offers a wide range of sports and adventure-based activities - discover new sensations!! Bicing in l´Escala is more than a simply renting bikes service. L'Escala Cycling is a public transport service. It is practical, sustainable and easy to use. Tour and enjoy the l'Escala region free from air and noise pollution. A walk along El Camí Forestal between l´Escala

name: Just us 2, in a cozy apartment in the mountains!
description:
in English...

Can Banal is a 16th century catalan farm house locally called masia that has been restored into three independent livings. During the summer we run a camp-site on the terraces below the main house.

The Green Apartment...
· Is a 20 m2 room with no balcony. There is a common outside space one floor below.
· Suitable for a couple and eventually a baby or a small child.
· Double bed (160cm) and private bath room.
· Kitchenette suitable for breakfasts and/or a simple meal preparation. With fridge, microwave and kitchen utensils.
· Central heating and tv&wifi. All the facilities for an own supported stay (sheets, towels, kitchen-tools, household items).
· The entrance to the house will be shared with us.

The landscape around Can Banal is in a rural and peacful environment with rivers and forests that changes colors depending on the season. In autumn there are varieties of mushrooms and in spring many types of orqu
neighborhood_overview:
Can Banal is situated in the beginning of the Catalan Pyrenees, in a region called “Alta Garrotxa”. Located midway between the sea-shore (45 min) and the high mountains of the Pyrenees (1h) makes it possible for many types of day-trips.
Close to many interesting places of cultural, natural or gourmet aspects like Castelfullit de la Roca, Besalu, the Garrotxa Volcanic Park or Olot.
Within a 6 km drive, Sadernes is reached from where the wonderful trekking path towards Sant Aniol d'Aguja starts.

The landscape around Can Banal is peaceful and rural, with rivers and forests that changes colours depending on the season. In autumn there are varieties of mushrooms and in spring many types of orquids and butterflies to enjoy.

host_about:
Hola, we are Stendert & Maria

We live in Mas Can Banal for many years. Stendert, born '51, originally is from Breda-Holland, and Maria, born '66, is from Stockholm-Sweden, where her parents once had arrived from Spain. We enjoy very much living here in the countryside surrounded by hills, forests, and rivers. Halfway to the sea and to the high mountains.

We are accompanied by our daughter Saskia born '02 and Stendert's son - Luuk, born  '93, who works in our village and in their spare time help us.

Our professions are of the most diverse; Maria studied interior design and artistic glass techniques and Stendert studied to become a tropical agronomist and later carpentry. Probably this multifaceted mixture connects us with many diverse interests and activities, especially the maintenance of CB with its forest, animals, and agro-tourism.

We hope to be able to combine these aspects of us and make your stay as pleasant and memorable as possible. Together, we speak 7 European languages and understand a few more. We like very much to tell you about our favorite places, help you out for more personal advice and add if there is a special event going on.

  Welcome·Bienvenidos·Welkom·Benvinguts·Välmommen·Bienvenue·Willkommen

Hola somos Maria and Stendert

Vivimos en Mas Can Banal desde hace muchos años. Stendert, nacido '51, originario de Breda , Holanda y María, nacida '66, de Estocolmo- Suecia , donde sus padres una vez llegaron desde España . Nos gusta mucho vivir aquí en el campo, rodeado de colinas, bosques y ríos. A mitad de camino hacia el mar y la mitad del camino a las altas montañas.

Nos acompaña nuestra hija Saskia, nacida '02 y Luuk, hijo de Stendert,  nacido en el '93, que trabaja en nuestro pueblo. Ambos en sus ratos libres nos ayudan en diferentes tareas.

Nuestras profesiones son de la más diversa; María estudió diseño de interiores y técnicas de vidrio artístico y Stendert estudió para ser ingeniero agrónomo tropical y mas tarde carpintería. Probablemente esta mezcla multifacética , nos conecta con muchos diversos intereses y actividades, en especial el mantenimiento de CB con su bosque, los animales y el agroturismo.

Esperamos ser capaces de combinar estos aspectos de nosotros y como hacer que su estancia sea lo más agradable y memorable como sea posible. En conjunto, se habla 7 idiomas europeos y entender algunos pocos más. Nos gusta mucho que decir acerca de nuestros lugares favoritos, ayudará a cabo el asesoramiento más personal y añadir si hay un evento especial ocurre.

name: Family 5, cozy & independent stay in the mountains
description:
Can Banal Rural is a 16th century catalan farm house locally called masia that has been restored into three independent livings. During the summer we run a camp-site on the terraces below the main house.

The Yellow Apartment
It is a cosy 40 m2 multi-space apartment with bed & bath-room, own kitchen & dining.
Beautiful views and tranquility.
Fits for couples as well for families.
Equipped with a double bed (160cm) and 3 bed places more, up in a loft compartment, suitable from around 5 up to15 years of age. Smaller children might sleep down in an adding bed or with their parents.
Central heating, tv&wifi, gas stove, micro-wave, fridge, extractor and a small balcony.
There are all the facilities for an own supported stay (sheets, towels, kitchen-tools, household items).
The entrance to the house will be shared with us.

The landscape around Can Banal is amazing, with rivers and forests that changes colors depending on the season.
neighborhood_overview:
Can Banal is situated in the beginning of the Catalan Pyrenees, in a region called “Alta Garrotxa”. Located midway between the sea-shore (45 min) and the high mountains of the Pyrenees (1h) makes it possible for many types of day-trips.
Close to many interesting places of cultural, natural or gourmet aspects like Castelfullit de la Roca, Besalu, the Garrotxa Volcanic Park or Olot.
Within a 6 km drive, Sadernes is reached from where the wonderful trekking path towards Sant Aniol d'Aguja starts.

The landscape around Can Banal is peaceful and rural, with rivers and forests that changes colours depending on the season. In autumn there are varieties of mushrooms and in spring many types of orquids and butterflies to enjoy.

If you just decides to stay around in Can Banal you'll find enough to do for few days. Walk our own signed trails along water creeks, fields, forests, hermitage, farms and villages round us. We have mountain bike’s to rent and in a 25' wal

name: Apt. sea view in Calella de Palafrugell
description:
Old fishing village formed by several coves that still preserve their charm, Calella is one of the few places on the Costa Brava which still preserves the charm of the villages of the area before the arrival of mass tourism, with narrow streets, steep tiled roofs and some traditional two-story fishermen’s dwellings.

This fishing village on a rocky coastline sprinkled with small coves north of Castell–Cap Roig natural area & south of Llafranc is ideal for walking, cycling or just relaxing.

name: El Serradell West - Your cottage in Alta Garrotxa
description:
El Serradell is an old "masia" (Catalan country house) which has been divided into two 2-storey appartments for 4/ 6 PAX each.
El Serradell is located in a magnificent remote outdoor setting, on a large estate with spectacular views overlooking the Catalan Pyrenees and the Garrotxa to the south. The house is 2hrs away from Barcelona, 1hr away from Girona, Figueres and the French border.
Access through 12km of forest road in good condition, you'll have to drive slowly.

The space
Typical "masia", or Catalan country house, dating back to the 10th century, but totally renovated in style and comfort.
This is your place if you are looking for nature, quiet and the best comfort.
The house is totally disconnected from the grid, and uses solar power and biomass for electricity and heating. Water supply from the nearby spring.

Guest access
Each appartment has an independent entrance and independent outdoor areas. The only shared
neighborhood_overview: El Serradell is located at the heart of the protected natural area of Alta Garrotxa, at an altitude of almost 1000m , surrounded by silence and holm oak, pine and beech groves.

name: Villa Extravagance 8 pax pool-beach
description:
#Modern Villa to #rent  in #Lloret de Mar on the Costa Brava. Total area more than 340 m2. Villa has  4 bedrooms (2 of them Suite), 4 bathrooms, separate kitchen, dining room, large living room, terrace with dining table and chairs, closed garage for 4 cars, to the sea 400 meters, house with swimming pool and barbecue. Capacity for 10 persons.

The space
Exterior:
Vila is located in the prestigious urbanization of Cala Tortuga, far from the city noise and at the same time near the centre of Lloret de Mar. House with swimming pool, barbecue and large terrace from where you can join beautiful sea view.
Cala Canyelles beach is about 7 min by car; there are two restaurants, cafes on the beach, yacht club. The centre of Lloret de Mar 5 minutes by car.
Within 10-15 minutes by car there is a Water world, children's entertainment Park and Dolphinarium.

Guest access
General
- air conditioning
- central heating
- Privat
neighborhood_overview:
Lloret de Mar’s diversity will make your holiday unforgettable
Villa Extravagance is so entertaining that you’ll almost forget about Lloret de Mar and the beach. Nevertheless, it’s only 2 km away Lloret de Mar’s centre and promenade so, in the unlikely event of you getting bored, you can always pay a visit to it. First of all, you can walk over the pebble sand beach and dip in the Mediterranean Sea. Besides all the tourist and cultural sightseeing, you’ll find many other interesting places.

And what about a city trip, or discovering other villages and places in the surroundings? Cities like Girona or Barcelona are easily reachable by car or public transport (from the bus station of Lloret de Mar). Villa Extravagance is also very well located to have a one day trip to a small and almost forgotten place, like Banyoles, Besalú, Rupit or the Sau reservoir.

description:
Nice and sunny apartment, 20 meters from the beach in front of the Medes Islands, one of the diving paradises in the Costa Brava. Beautiful excursions to any population in the area in 20 min. Girona 30 min. Barcelona 80 min., La Jonquera 45 min.

The space
Located in a beautiful natural area on the Costa Brava. At 3' walk from the beach.
Very quiet urbanization, 10' walk from the town center.
Trips to Girona (30'), Barcelona (80'), Figueres (Dali Museum) (20 '), Pyrenees (40').
Great and recognized swimming area and water sports (diving, katesurf, windsurd, sailing), golf, horse riding and beautiful cycling tours between fields directly from the apartment.

Guest access
Swimming pool, large communal garden area, supermarkets nearby, easy street parking.
The apartment has a double bedroom with two single beds and a big sofa-bed (two adults and three children) in the large room.

name: Can Nentia, encantadora casa de Turismo Rural.
description:
Can Nentia es una hermosa casa rural del siglo XIX que recupera la hospitalidad de las antiguas casas de pueblo, con amplias estancias y rincones acogedores. En el corazón del Baix Empordà, entre el mar y la montaña, aún existen lugares donde disfrutar de unos días inolvidables. A tan solo 20 minutos de nuestra casa estan las playas más maravillosas de la Costa Brava, lo cual os permite disfrutar de un fantástico día y retiraros al atardecer a Can Nentia para gozar de la paz y el descanso.

The space
En Can Nentia encontrará un amplio comedor muy iluminado, con bóveda catalana, en el que podrá disfrutar de grandes momentos, en la mejor compañía.
Una acogedora cocina con chimenea, donde podrá preparar unas tostadas con pan con tomate y carne a la brasa.
Una entrada muy grande que hace de distribuidor de los espacios.
Habitación Romero, con cama de matrimonio y baño con ducha. Una combinación perfecta entre piedra y madera, calidez y bienestar.
neighborhood_overview: El pueblo de Fonteta está situado a pie de las Gavarres, prácticamente a la entrada de sus bosques, justo a la derecha del arroyo que lleva su nombre. El núcleo urbano forma un conjunto compacto de calles estrechas en el entorno de la iglesia parroquial de Santa María. Algunas de sus calles conservan aún el antiguo empedrado y le dan un característico aspecto rural de pueblo marcadamente ampurdanés. El edificio más singular y notable del núcleo, además de algunas casas de gran valor histórico y arquitectónico, es la iglesia parroquial de Santa María, que debía existir ya el 904.
host_about: Soy un hombre trabajador, amante del hogar y la familia, gran amigo de mis amigos, mi gran pasión es mi huerto. Trabajo de constructor, lo que me ha permitido restaurar la casa que ahora les ofrezco, espero que la disfruten.

name: Cute country house in Costa Brava
description:
An ideal place to discover and enjoy the Costa Brava.

The space
Our house is a lovely retreat in a country setting, from which you can plan the most wonderful day-trips in Catalonia: going to swim to the neighboring beaches, or visiting the Roman ruins of Empuries, and even spending a whole day in Girona or in Barcelona. The house offers a beautiful private garden with a swimming pool and wonderful views.
It is an ideal place to spend the holidays for families with children, and specially with kids up to 16 years old.

The house is fully equipped to enjoy a comfortable accommodation. Includes linens and bath towels. It also has a maintenance service for the garden and the pool.

Around Llampaies you can do all kind of outdoor activities: cycling, horse riding, tennis, golf, diving, windsurfing. From the house you can take nice walks in the countryside.

Although the best thing is to have your own car, in the neighboring village

name: Large family-an Apartment for an independent stay!
description:
Can Banal is a 16th century catalan farm house locally called masia that has been restored into three independent livings. During the summer we run a camp-site on the terraces below the main house.

The Terracotta Apartment...
· Is a 60 m2 large room, suitable max 7 persons – preferently a large family.
· There is a double bed (160cm), a bunk bed and a bed-sofa.
· The kitchen is equipped with gas cooking-stove, micro-wave and an extractor.
· It has a large furnished balcony with a pleasant view.
· Central heating and tv&wifi. There are all the facilities for an own supported stay (sheets, towels, kitchen-tools, household items)
· It is a good reunion room for medium size groups.
· The entrance to the house will be shared with us.

The landscape around Can Banal is in a rural and peaceful environment with rivers and forests that changes colors depending on the season. In autumn there are varieties of mushrooms and in spring many
neighborhood_overview:
Can Banal is situated in the beginning of the Catalan Pyrenees, in a region called “Alta Garrotxa”. Located midway between the sea-shore (45 min) and the high mountains of the Pyrenees (1h) makes it possible for many types of day-trips.
Close to many interesting places of cultural, natural or gourmet aspects like Castelfullit de la Roca, Besalu, the Garrotxa Volcanic Park or Olot.
Within a 6 km drive, Sadernes is reached from where the wonderful trekking path towards Sant Aniol d'Aguja starts.

The landscape around Can Banal is peaceful and rural, with rivers and forests that changes colours depending on the season. In autumn there are varieties of mushrooms and in spring many types of orquids and butterflies to enjoy.

If you just decides to stay around in Can Banal you'll find enough to do for few days. Walk our own signed trails along water creeks, fields, forests, hermitage, farms and villages round us. We have mountain bike’s to rent and in a 25' wal
host_about:
Hola, we are Stendert & Maria

We live in Mas Can Banal for many years. Stendert, born '51, originally is from Breda-Holland, and Maria, born '66, is from Stockholm-Sweden, where her parents once had arrived from Spain. We enjoy very much living here in the countryside surrounded by hills, forests, and rivers. Halfway to the sea and to the high mountains.

We are accompanied by our daughter Saskia born '02 and Stendert's son - Luuk, born  '93, who works in our village and in their spare time help us.

Our professions are of the most diverse; Maria studied interior design and artistic glass techniques and Stendert studied to become a tropical agronomist and later carpentry. Probably this multifaceted mixture connects us with many diverse interests and activities, especially the maintenance of CB with its forest, animals, and agro-tourism.

We hope to be able to combine these aspects of us and make your stay as pleasant and memorable as possible. Together, we speak 7 European languages and understand a few more. We like very much to tell you about our favorite places, help you out for more personal advice and add if there is a special event going on.

  Welcome·Bienvenidos·Welkom·Benvinguts·Välmommen·Bienvenue·Willkommen

Hola somos Maria and Stendert

Vivimos en Mas Can Banal desde hace muchos años. Stendert, nacido '51, originario de Breda , Holanda y María, nacida '66, de Estocolmo- Suecia , donde sus padres una vez llegaron desde España . Nos gusta mucho vivir aquí en el campo, rodeado de colinas, bosques y ríos. A mitad de camino hacia el mar y la mitad del camino a las altas montañas.

Nos acompaña nuestra hija Saskia, nacida '02 y Luuk, hijo de Stendert,  nacido en el '93, que trabaja en nuestro pueblo. Ambos en sus ratos libres nos ayudan en diferentes tareas.

Nuestras profesiones son de la más diversa; María estudió diseño de interiores y técnicas de vidrio artístico y Stendert estudió para ser ingeniero agrónomo tropical y mas tarde carpintería. Probablemente esta mezcla multifacética , nos conecta con muchos diversos intereses y actividades, en especial el mantenimiento de CB con su bosque, los animales y el agroturismo.

Esperamos ser capaces de combinar estos aspectos de nosotros y como hacer que su estancia sea lo más agradable y memorable como sea posible. En conjunto, se habla 7 idiomas europeos y entender algunos pocos más. Nos gusta mucho que decir acerca de nuestros lugares favoritos, ayudará a cabo el asesoramiento más personal y añadir si hay un evento especial ocurre.

name: MASIA AISLADA EN LA ALTA GARROTXA
description:
Se alquila Masía aislada del S XV totalmente restaurada conservando los elementos originales, pero con las comodidades actuales. La casa está situada en el Espacio Natural de la Alta Garrotxa a 12 Km del pueblo de Tortellà por un camino rural en buenas condiciones (20 mints en coche).

The space
Lugar para desconectar de la rutina, autentica Masia catalana del año 1403 rodeada totalmente de naturaleza y grandes bosques, donde podrás estar integrado en un paisaje Único y totalmente aislado.
La casa es auto sostenible y ecológica: se calienta con caldera de leña se ilumina con energía solar y el agua brota directamente de unas fuentes.
Junto a la casa está la Masoveria y la casa de los propietarios que se dedican a la ganadería ecológica.
Con una superficie de 220 metros y capacidad para 8 personas dispone de 4 habitaciones dobles y dos baños completos. Cocina con chimenea, Salón de 55 metros, pequeña capilla y zonas exteriores con piscina de mader

name: PROMO LAST WEEK AVAIL COSTA BRAVA 16 to 23 July
description:
Exclusive apart on the seafront in a residential complex, overlooking the Gulf of Roses and the Pyrenees, fully equipped for 4 persons with swimming pool, playing room, parking, concierge and close to the most charming villages of Emporda. With a tourist license, it is only available for a few weeks a year, those that we leave free, and the guests who repeat year after year.

The space
The apart is located in an exceptional resort on the sea and overlooking the Pyrenees, in the Alt Emporda area of fishing villages and coves with clear water as Cadaqués, Roses, Port de la Selva, Begur and small and charming medieval villages like Madremanya, Pals, Peratallada or Foixá, castles and quiet and green surroundings, just 3 km from the center of L'Escala, but located in a sea environment and forests and very quiet. (see .kmz locator (website hidden) Earth.)

By the magic of his views and the Emporda region of Catalunya -the Tuscany I love the sunrises and sunset
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood, like L'Escala in gral., have 95% a profile family holiday with children or single adult couples who love nature, good food and history of the area and outdoor sports.

Due to the absence of public transport, we dont´ have adolescent groups alone, those who prefer other cities such as Lloret de Mar or Roses.

The small island located opposite is a well known center for diving and snorkelling, and very close, 500 mts has a beach in Cala Montgo with sand if you come with little children.

If you enjoy sailing and windsurfing, you have at the port two schools that teach and rent small boats like 420, hobbycat, H20, Laser and other sailboats.

Also in the area there are golf courses and trails for hiking and other sports related to nature.

If you like Dalí, 20 km in Figueres is Dali Museum with much of his work.

The weather is usually sunny in July and August, with an average temperature of 26º and a good pleas
host_about:
Hola, mi nombre es Bruno, soy arquitecto y mi pareja Luz se desempeña como profesional en el área del turismo. Somos 4 si contamos a Nachito, de casi 4 años, y a Valentina de 19 que viaja con nosotros una vez al año.
Vivimos y trabajamos en BCN y disponemos en alquiler sólo por un tiempo muy corto y en verano, de un hermoso apartamento completamente equipado para 4 personas en L´ Escala, Costa Brava a 40 km de Francia, en primera línea de mar, con unas vistas increíbles al Golfo de Roses.

El resto del año tratamos de disfrutarlo nosotros, es realmente nuestra segunda casa, y es un placer salir de BCN poniendo rumbo al Empordá a relajarnos cada vez que podemos.

Somos viajeros mas que turistas, y eso, entre otras cosas, nos define.

name: Costa Brava, 50 m from beach 4
description:
Apartment in a quiet street in the center of Sant Antoni de Calonge, 50 meters from beach
3 bedrooms (2 double, 1 with bunk bed)
2 bathrooms with shower
Living room with balcony
Satellite TV, Internet WiFi
2 balconies
Private parking for 1 car

The space
Sant Antoni combines a rich medieval history with modern day facilities, offering an ideal place to relax, either on the beach or in the mountains. It lies 2 km away from Palamós, along the seashore path, offering the visitor exceptional views of our coasts.

The beautiful winding path along the "Camino de Ronda", will also take you to Playa de Aro. During the walk, you will be able to sit down and rest on any of the terraces and enjoy the sunshine, even during the winter months.

The apartment is:

In a residential building in a quiet street in the center of Sant Antoni de Calonge, one row of houses behind the seafront. 50 meters from the beach
neighborhood_overview:
Shops, supermarkets, restaurants, sea sports rentals, all within 10 minutes walk from the apartment.

Sant Antoni combines a rich medieval history with modern day facilities, offering an ideal place to relax, either on the beach or in the mountains. It lies 2 km away from Palamós, along the seashore path, offering the visitor exceptional views of our coasts.

The beautiful winding path along the "Camino de Ronda", will also take you to Playa de Aro. During the walk, you will be able to sit down and rest on any of the terraces and enjoy the sunshine, even during the winter months.
host_about:
Hello,

We are a family who own a number of apartments and houses
-  Costa Brava, Spain (town of Sant Antoni de Calonge and town of Palamos)

We speak fluent English, French, Danish, Spanish, Catalan, German and Mandarin Chinese.

My father is a diplomat, so we have lived and traveled extensively around the world. We enjoy meeting travelers and try our best to make your stay as enjoyable as possible.

We have contracted cleaning and maintenance staff, available to solve any issue that may come up during your stay, as soon as possible.

Generally Ana (in Spain) will be the ones to meet you at the property and provide tips about the area (she can advise on activities, restaurants, shops...). 

We enjoy good food and wine, sailing (and may be able to take you out on a boat trip locally depending on the dates of your visit), scuba diving, skiing, go-karting, adventure sports in general, entrepreneurial ventures, football, art and architecture, handicrafts etc.

name: Apartament La Font en Palalfrugell
description:
Apartamento céntrico situado en un calle peatonal y céntrica de la población. Construcción con paredes de piedra y techo de madera. El salón, comedor y cocina en un único espacio con techo alto, con chimenea de hierro que le da calidez al espacio.

The space
Se pueden alojar un máximo de 6 personas. Si es necesario se dispone de cuna y/o trona para niños.
Excelentes playas a 3 kilómetros.

Guest access
Dispone de conexión de wifi.
Chimenea y aire condicionado.

neighborhood_overview: Apartamento a pocos metros del centro de la población con calles peatonales y comenciales, entorno tranquilo. Por las mañanas, mercado municipal para poder comprar frutas, verduras, carne y pescado fresco cada dia.
host_about: Estoy casada y tengo cuatro hijos, un chico de 21 años y trillizas de 16 años. Trabajo por cuenta propia, soy arquitecta técnica. Me gusta hacer deporte, sobretodo el senderismo, i también ir en bicicleta y nadar. Me gusta estar con la familia y con los amigos. Me encanta viajar, sobretodo visitar ciudades europeas. Pero también me apasiona el contacto con la naturaleza y descubrir lugares con encanto.

Добро пожаловать в райский уголок Лланса! Вас встретят с радостью и любовью!

name: Can Bonet turismo rural -La Volta
description:
Can Bonet es una pequeña casa de turismo rural que os ofrece 3 apartamentos independientes.
Situado a las afueras del precioso pueblo de Sant Martí Vell, rodeado de naturaleza, es el lugar ideal para descansar y relajarse.

The space
"La Volta" es una apartamento grande, con 2 habitaciones dobles, una cocina equipada, una sala comedor y un baño con ducha.

La casa está rodeada de naturaleza, al pie del macizo de las Gavarres. Un lugar muy tranquilo idílico para desconectar y retomar fuerzas.

Guest access
La casa dispone de:
- wifi gratuito
- barbacoa
- piscina en los meses de verano
- bicicletas de diferentes tamaños
- juegos de mesa
- etc.

neighborhood_overview:
El pueblo de Sant Martí Vell es un pequeño municipio muy tranquilo. Su situación es perfecta: un entorno rural y tranquilo a 20 minutos de Girona y a 30 minutos de la Costa Brava.
La zona, conocida como el Ampudán, es mágica por los pequeños pueblos medievales y su espíritu rural. También es conocida como la Toscana catalana.

host_about:
Bonjour,
Mon nom est Olivia Sales et je suis née le 18 mai 1981.
Je vis dans le sud de la France à Perpignan dans les Pyrénées-Orientales.
Les Pyrénées-Orientales sont un département français situé dans le sud de la France, dans le nord de la Catalogne, à la frontière avec l'Espagne, dans la région du Languedoc-Roussillon.
Je vis entre la mer Méditerranée et les Pyrénées.
C'est une belle région baignée par le soleil. Il y a de nombreuses activités à faire qu'elles soient sportives, culturelles ou de détente.
Voyager est ma grande passion, j'ai visité de nombreux pays:
L'Espagne, le Portugal, l'Italie, la Hongrie, la Roumanie, l'Irlande, la Slovénie, la Grèce, Malte, la Sardaigne, les Baléares, les îles Canaries, le Royaume-Uni, la Turquie, Cuba, l'île de la Réunion, les États-Unis et les îles d'Hawaï.

name: Private villa with pool & sea view for families
description:
Villa with great sea views overlooking the valley of Palamos and St Antoni de Calonge. We accept families and guests 30+.
Top floor: kitchen, living room, WC, roof terrace and small balcony.
Lower floor: 4 bedrooms w/ double beds - two new bathrooms.
Large terraced garden with pergola and generous pool area.

Quote from previous guest: "French riviera meets vintage Hollywood Hills."

The space
Villa Mariposa is very private - set on the end of the street Carrer Om in the urbanization of Rio de Oro - located on the hillside of Calonge. The house offers a spectacular view over the valley of Calonge and bay of St Antoni de Calonge/Palamos.

The house have a large landscaped garden with pergola for comfortable shade and a pool area with space for 8 pool beds.
The partly refurbished (2013) terraced house is 190+ sqm over two floors. Upper floor with a brand new kitchen, a large roof terrace, spacious living room area with
neighborhood_overview:
The house is located in the quiet urbanization Eio de Oro - only 10 minutes with car from the ocean front. Two good supermercados in the village of Calonge - only five minutes with car. Eurospar the closest one and Suma by the entrance to the village.
There is a great restaurant in the urbanization - Restaurant Rio de Oro.
host_about:
Villa Mariposa is our dream project. After searching for both the right area and then the right house - we found Villa Mariposa in febuary 2013. The house was in bad shape but we saw the potential.

We planned the renovation with an architect from Barcelona and finished the first renovation phase for the summer of 2013 - and we will continue with more renovation projects along with time.

We travel a lot - New York, Sydney, Europe, Asia - and over the years we have come to places where we have found special details or fantastic ambience or great views. These "moments" have been the inspiration for Villa Mariposa. Spacious, not to much furniture, a garden garden that tells a story over the year - and a view that takes the breath away.

name: Casita rural en la Costa Brava
description:
Casa rural con piscina privada en un entorno privilegiado. A 1km de la playa de la Gola.
Gran salón comedor con chimenea, cocina equipada, un baño y dos habitaciones con 4 camas. Rodeada de naturaleza. Cerca de las mejores playas de la costa brava.

The space
La Casita es el lugar perfecto para pasar unos días de calma y relax. Rodeada de naturaleza, y envuelta del encanto rural de la zona. Perfecta para los amantes de lo ecológico.
La Casita es una vivienda autosuficiente y ecológica. El agua se obtiene a través de un pozo y la luz la recibimos a partir de una instalación de placas solares. La calefacción en invierno la conseguimos con la canalización del calor del fuego de la chimenea . Nos hace muy feliz saber que se puede vivir respetando el medio. Tenemos arboles frutales , manzano, peral, olivos y disfrutamos recolectando sus frutos y hasta hemos elaborado conservas para disponer de ellas durante todo el año.
En su interior se combina la p
neighborhood_overview:
La Costa brava tiene lugares para perderse, es simplemente maravillosa en todas las épocas del año.
La casita se encuentra rodeada de campos de cultivo, cereal y frutales, el paisaje es completamente llano, impera el castillo de Montgrí.
Tenemos la playa de la Gola a escasos 1000 metros, que confluye con la desembocadura del río Ter. Esta zona y los alrededores forman parte del "Parque natural de las Islas Medas y el Ter" y en ella hay rutas para hacer a pie, senderos recomendados para ir en bicicleta, puntos para avistar aves, ...
Desde la casita se pueden ver las “Islas Medas" que constituyen una de las reservas de flora y fauna marinas más importantes del mediterráneo occidental, así como uno de los destinos más apreciado para los amantes del submarinismo. Diferentes empresas proponen viajes a bordo de barcos con fondos de cristal.
Son poblaciones vecinas, Begur, Pals, Peratallada, Ullastret, Escala, St martí de Ampúries, la Bisbal, st Pere Pescador, Cadaqués

Bonita casa con jardín junto a las más bellas playas de la Costa Brava.

Urbanizacion que permite maxima privacidad, muy cerca de las mas bellas playas de la costa brava de Pals y Begur y de rutas de senderismo.

Other things to note

neighborhood_overview: sin registro
host_about:
Somos Ana y Jaume, estamos en el sector de la medicina y de la enseñanza, nos gusta viajar y 
nos encanta el contacto directo con la naturaleza,la buena gastronomia y la belleza en todos sus aspectos. Por eso nuestra casa esta en L'Empordá, que reune todo eso y mucho más, siempre decimos que aquí te reconcilias con la vida, con la buena vida..
Nos sentimos muy afortunados y por eso tambien queremos que otros vivan la experiencia que este lugar mágico ofrece.

name: Apartamento para 4 Personas - La Selva de Mar
description:
Casa situada a la entrada de un pueblo de ensueño escondido entre montañas. Excepcional zona para practicar senderismo ya que linda con el Parque Natural del Cap de Creus. A 1 km de unas preciosas calas, 20 km de Francia y 12 km de Cadaqués

The space
Estupendo para 4 personas.
Terraza de 70m2 con vistas a ambos lados para disfrutar durante el día y de unas noches llenas de estrellas.
No hay problemas de aparcamiento.
Cocina totalmente equipada con vitrocerámica.
Casa ventilada y espaciosa.

Other things to note
Alojamiento es de 5 noches mínimo.
En el precio no están incluidas las sábanas y toallas. En caso de necesitarlos el precio es de 1 juego de sábanas y toallas (por persona) de 15€.
HUTG-015191 HUTG-015191

House located at the entrance of a dreaming village hidden in the mountains. Exceptional area for hiking and bordering the Natural Park of Cap de Creus. 1 km from beautiful beaches, 20 km from France and 12 km from Cadaqués. Perfect for water sports (windsurfing, diving ... etc)

name: SANT CARLES 6 Apartment in the urban centre with pool and close to the beach
description:
Apartment in the urban centre with pool and close to the beach.

The space
This cosy apartment is located at the urban zone of the Sant Carles, of the coast and familiar village of Llançà, where you can do a lot of aquatic activities (Kayak, snorkel, sailing, fishing, windsurf, etc.) And mountain activities (hiking, the GR9, the Sant Jaume path, discover dolmens in the zone, visit the great monastery of Sant Pere de Rodes...)
This little village it’s between the Cap de Creus and the Albera, near to the fishing villages of Port de la Selva, Cadaqués and Colera, where you can discover their history and culture, their gastronomy and their magnificent landscapes of the Costa Brava.
Llançà it’s near Figueres too, where you will find restaurants, shops and the incredible Dali’s museum. Also you can visit the rustic village of Perelada and they amazing Casino, and the little villages of the Alt Empordà whit their famous vineyards with D.O Empordà.
This fan

This little village is between the Cap de Creus and the Albera, close to seaside villages like Port de la Selva, Cadaqués and Colera, where you can discover their history, their gastronomy and their beautiful and amazing natural landscapes.

Llançà is near Figueres town where you can visit the Dali’s museum and the Figueres’ shops. It is near to Perelada and its wonderful Casino too.

A ten-minute walk (800 meters) from the public bus stop Line L04

Five minutes by car (2.5 km) from the town and its beaches.

Guest access
Private pool and barbecue

name: Casa con encanto cerca de la playa
description:
Una casa reformado por completo y decorada por nosotros mismos, con mucho encanto y realmente acogedora. Hecho con mucho amor y dedicación para que uno se sienta como en casa y disfrutar de la tranquilidad y desconexion con toda la familia, incluido por supuesto los animales, que tambien son familia.

La playa está a 2 min caminando, junto al bonito pueblo, donde hay una preciosa iglesia, y varios restaurantes a su alrededor. Tiene mucho encanto y unas vistas preciosas en el mirador.

The space
En la parte del jardín, se dispone de barbacoa, hamacas para tumbarse y relajarse, sillas de jardín con una gran mesa para poder desayunar, comer y cenar, pudiendo disfrutar del día en un espacio tranquilo y privado.

El vallado de madera del jardín es zona privada. Lo utilizamos como almacén. Es totalmente independiente de la casa, tiene entrada independiente donde la puerta de entrada es por la calle.

La habitación de matrimonio, es una

name: Rustic apartment near beaches and golf courses
description:
Located at the characteristic medieval village of Palau-Sator, this renovated apartment offers you a comfortable residency during your holidays. The living room, dining room, and kitchen merge into a single open-plan space, painted in warm tones and filled with light. Totally furnished, the living room area is fitted out with two sofas, a coffee table and, for your entertainment, a flat screen TV and Wi-Fi service.
The apartment offers also two bedrooms and one bathroom.

The space
This specific location, which is setteld in a very quiet medieval village is an exceptional catalan

Guest access
The apartment has no public areas. All spaces, interior and exterior, are strictly for private use. Wifi.

Other things to note
As for the tourist accommodation tax, upon arrival, you will be charged the amount of € 0.45 / per person over 16 years / night (up to 7 nights).

Minimum 7 nights from Saturday to Saturday
neighborhood_overview: Historic center of Palau-Sator, medieval village in the province of Girona. Located 10-15 minutes from the beaches of the Costa Brava (Pals, Begur, Estartit..). Palau-Sator, is a quiet tourist town. You will not find large crowds. The neighbours, mostly, are people from the country. It is also important to note that in the village there are exactly 4 restaurants, I particularly recommend Can Saló and Mas Pou.
host_about:
Soy nacido en el Empordà, en la población de Palafrugell, y actualmente tengo 42 años.

Vivo en La Bisbal d'Empordà, con Silvia, mi compañera y con Mel, Maui y Bruno, nuestras mascotas.

Me licencié en Derecho en el año 2000 pero nunca he ejercido la profesión; seguramente, porqué prefiero la tranquilidad de la vida en mi tierra que teñir mi existencia con las tensiones de los Tribunales ( no estoy hecho para esto ).

En Airbnb anunciamos casas de la familia ( 2 casas en Canet de La Tallada y dos apartamentos en Palau-Sator ) y también otra casa cuyos derechos de explotación he adquirido ( Sant Iscle d'Empordà ).

El proyecto inicial de las casas de Canet de la Tallada era la venta pero la depresión del sector inmobiliario hizo a la familia cambiar de opinión y decidimos su explotación en modo de arrendamiento. Además, cuando no están alquiladas las usamos la familia ( somos 5 hermanos ).

En Palau-Sator, los apartamentos que tienen origen en la rehabilitación de la casa de mis abuelos paternos. Era una casa muy grande y hace ya más de 15 años la familia tomó la decisión de restaurara en este sentido.

Después de 3 años en la plataforma, mi experiencia como anfitrión con Airbnb es francamente buena. Salvo pequeños detalles y algún caso aislado estamos muy contentos con los huéspedes que nos han llegado.

Recomiendo el Empordà de forma enérgica, cualquiera de sus rincones, espacios, paisajes o playas...Esta región, es muchísimo más que el conocido Triángulo de Oro. Os lo aseguro!! 

Aquí, puedes relajarte, divertirte, ir de fiesta, en globo, practicar equitación, bajar en canoa por el río Ter, alquilar un velero, ir en bici, jugar a Golf o Picht&Putt, practicar nudismo, bañarte en calas preciosas o, si lo prefieres, en playas kilométricas, perderte en largos paseos al atarceder y comerte un buen arroz!!

name: Habitación con terraza
description:
En Sant Pere Pescador rodeado de campos fruteros, al principio de la reserva natural “Parc de Mig de Dos Rius” dónde hay una gran diversidad de fauna, al lado del río Fluvià i cerca de la playa, en el corazón de los Aiguamolls de l'Empordà.

The space
El mas se encuentra en Sant Pere Pescador rodeado de campos fruteros, al principio de la reserva natural “Parc de Mig de Dos Rius” dónde hay una gran diversidad de fauna, al lado del río Fluvià i cerca de la playa, en el corazón de los Aiguamolls de l’Empordà.

La masía está situada en la comarca del Alt Empordà, en la población de Sant Pere Pescador, en el Baix Fluvià. El pueblo se encuentra a unos 300 m y se puede ir dando un paseo. Aproximadamente a un kilómetro tenemos la desembocadura del Fluvià de gran valor ecológico y la playa que tiene una extensión de 6 km. de dunas de arena fina. Es una de las pocas playas que se mantienen vírgenes en la Costa Brava.

El camino que pasa por delante de
neighborhood_overview:

Figueres (19 km): Museu Dalí, museo del juguete, de la técnica, del Empordà, Castillo de Sant Ferran, ….
Castelló d’Empúries (8,5 km): villa condal, basílica de Santa María, la harinera, …
L’Escala (12 km): ruinas greco-romanas de Empúries, fábricas de anchoas,…
Roses (17 km): castillo de la Trinidad, Ciutadella, monumentos megalíticos, puerto pesquero, …
Sant Pere de Rodes (28 km): monasterio románico.
Cap de Creus (38 km): Parque Natural.
Besalú (38 km): pueblo medieval, Puente Viejo, baños judíos, ….
Girona (50 km): catedral, barrio judío, la Rambla, la Devesa, …
Barcelona: 147 km.

name: AL01 Studio 250 m from Fenals Beach, Costa Brava
description:
Nice and cozy studio, tastefully decorated, situated in an enclosed grounds with swimming pool only 250 meters from the beach in one of the best areas of Lloret de Mar - Fenals. It has a bright living room with a comfortable sofa bed of 160 cm, a fully equipped kitchen with appliances and cooking utensils, TV, WI-FI internet (included in the price), iron, air conditioning etc., and a bathroom with bath and hairdryer.

The space
The studio has a bright room with a very comfortable 160 cm sofa-bed, a fully equipped kitchen with appliances and kitchen utensils, TV, Wi-Fi internet (included in the price), iron, air conditioning etc., and a bathroom with bathtub and dryer.

Guest access
Guests can access the garden and the communal pool

Other things to note
Included in the price:
- welcome detail (for stays from 1 week)
- supplies (electricity, water)
- Internet WIFI
- Linens and towels

NOT inc
neighborhood_overview: The Fenals area is very quiet and perfect for family holidays. It has a very complete infrastructure: restaurants, cafeterias, shops, supermarkets, playgrounds, transport stops and multiple places of leisure. It is 15 minutes walk from the center of the village and its nightlife, for those who wish to go out to spend a fun and enjoyable time. A few meters away are the beaches of Fenals and Sa Boadella, recognized as one of the most beautiful beaches of the Costa Brava.
host_about: Hello! My name is Verónica. I live in Lloret de Mar, Costa Brava and I am in love with this wonderful place. I love traveling! I am dedicated to vacation rentals in Lloret de Mar, Playa de Aro and Sagaro. Since 2009 we have hosted travelers from all over the world in our accommodations and we love our work. We will be happy to welcome new travelers on the Costa Brava and provide them with the best conditions and advice for an unforgettable stay.

House: 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, kitchen, living room with a terrace with beautiful views of the Mediterranean Sea , communal swimming pool, parking.
There is also a possibility to charter a yacht for an additional fee.

The space
The house is located in a small bay Canyelles Petites in Roses. From the terrace there is a very beautiful view of the bay. Easy access to all the attractions. In the area there are numerous cafes, restaurants, clubs.
The house can accommodate up to 6 people.
It is possible, for an extra fee, to take a cruise by boat and see Costa Brava from the sea. I suggest trips to the surrounding bays or to Cadaques (with a break to visit the house of Salvador Dali). Guests can choose the direction of the cruise.

Llançà is a coast and familiar village, where you can do a lot of aquatic activities (Kayak, snorkel, sailing, fishing, windsurf, etc.) And mountain activities (hiking, the GR9, the Sant Jaume path, discover dolmens in the zone, visit the great monastery of Sant Pere de Rodes...)This little village it’s between the Cap de Creus and the Albera, near to the fishing villages of Port de la Selva, Cadaqués and Colera, where you can discover their
neighborhood_overview:
Incredible seafront apartment in the quiet zone of Cap Ras!

This magnificent apartment with fantastic sea views it’s located at Cap Ras zone in the familiar seaside village of Llançà, where you can do different sea activities (Kayack, sail, diving, windsurf, etc..) ant mountain activities ( GR92, mountain and sea routes, the Santiago path, dolmen, Sant Pere de Rodes monastery…)

This little village is between the Cap de Creus and the Albera, close to seaside villages like Port de la Selva, Cadaqués and Colera, where you can discover their history, their gastronomy and their beautiful and amazing natural landscapes.

Llançà is near Figueres town where you can visit the Dali’s museum and the Figueres shops. It is near to Perelada and its wonderful Casino.
