name: Costabravaforrent Carrió, with pool and garden
description:
Can Carrió is a beautiful villa, with its own private swimming pool of 10x5m, set in an outstanding area surrounded by nature. The property is formed of a main building and an annex of three big suites.

The space
Can Carrió is a beautiful villa, with its own private swimming pool of 10x5m, set in an outstanding area surrounded by nature. The property is formed of a main building and an annex of three big suites.

The main building consists of a suite complete with a bathroom with a shower, a living room with three sofas plus two armchairs and a fireplace, a lounge with two sofas and a fireplace, a dining room with seating for 14, a guests’ bathroom and a fully equipped kitchen. All with an exterior aspect affording lots of light and sun, plus views and access to the terraces and garden.

The annex contains three big suites, each suitable for up to 4 people. The suites all include a double bed and in one a single bed with guest bed underneath w
neighborhood_overview:
GPS Coordenades: 42.034452554751766, 2.9899871349334717

Can Carrió is located in the northern part of Foixà, in the neighbourhood of Cuells, in a residential zone surrounded by fields and pine and oak woodland which give a magical air of tranquillity.

4Km away is the Gala/Dali foundation in Púbol Castle, vertex of the Dali triangle with Figueres and Port- Lligat. 35km away is the town of Figueres and the Museo Dalí.

20 Km from Foixà are the beaches of Empúries, Escala, Estartit and Pals, and the Costa Brava stretching out before you. Estartit offers an important base for Scuba diving in the protected surroundings of the Medes Islands. Also 20km away is the historic city of Girona.

Around the village there are different cycle routes and footpaths which allow you to explore the local area.

name: Cosy Apart 2 Minutes Walk to Beach, + parking
description:
Sleeps 5. Bedrooms 3, bathrooms 2. Fully renovated in 2013. Large shared garden. Located in the center of the village, has fantastic facilities in the area (3-5 m walk): great range of, restaurants, shops, supermarkets.(HUTG-013170)

The space
The apartment, fully renovated and equipped in 2013, is on the first floor and all rooms are exterior. The fully equipped kitchen is very nice with the window overlooking the garden with beautiful twisted pines; near the window, there is a dining table for 6 people, which is very handy. Meals can also be enjoyed on the terrace. The living room has two sofas and a TV; during the warm season, it is possible to expand the space of the terrace opening the sliding glass doors. Two full bathrooms. A large private garden is good for children. Parking for one car is available in the basement of the building. Beach (2 minutes away) is one km long, with a very convenient sand (not too big to hurt your bare feet and not too thin to g
neighborhood_overview: The quietness of the place. The great beach that is very comfortable for its very convenient sand and clean water. Great range of bars, restaurants, shops, supermarkets, all only in 3-5 mins walk away. Barcelona and Girona towns are available by car, but also by bus  (the bus station is 5 minutes walk from the apartment) and so are many villages (see below).
host_about: Biólogo retirado, amante de las artes, letras y la ciencias. Me gusta particularmente las artes escénicas, tambien viajar. Para estancias largas prefiero las grandes ciudades. Vivo en Barcelona y me gusta mucho, y no me importaria vivir en Nueva York. Para estancias cortas tambien amo la naturaleza. Aunque frugal, me gusta la buena cocina i el buen vino. La familia y los amigos som de la maxima importancia. Politicamente soy liberal: vive y deja vivir

neighborhood_overview: The pictures of the beach do not correspond to the view from the house. They are of Cala Canyelles, the closest beach to the villa. neighborhood_overview: Está situada en la costa norte del golfo de Rosas, al sur del cabo de Creus. Es un gran centro turístico, con urbanizaciones, hoteles y playas[6]​ y dos puertos (pesquero y deportivo), y un lugar atractivo y de gran relieve dentro del sector septentrional de la Costa Brava. La costa del municipio de Rosas incluye una larga playa de arena y más hacia el este un gran número de calas, entre las cuales destacan Canyelles Petites, L'Almadrava, Cabo Norfeu, Punta Falconera y Montjoi.
host_about:
Hola queridos seguidores de Airbnb, llevo desde 2014 con esa gran Familia, tengo 56 años, soy una mujer divorciada, con 2 hijas lindas y 4 nietitos que son el amor de mi vida. Actualmente vivo Sóla, me gusta hacer submarinismo y caminar por la playa. Soy una persona tranquila pero con obligaciones y responsabilidades. 
Espero conocerles pronto, estoy segura que les van a encantar  mi  bonito lúminoso y tranquilo apartamento.
Un abrazo.
Lucía.

name: PORT 6 Great apartment in front of the beach
description:
Great apartment in front of the beach.

The space
This cosy apartment is located at the urban zone of the Port, of the coast and familiar village of Llançà, where you can do a lot of aquatic activities (Kayak, snorkel, sailing, fishing, windsurf, etc.) And mountain activities (hiking, the GR9, the Sant Jaume path, discover dolmens in the zone, visit the great monastery of Sant Pere de Rodes...)
This little village it’s between the Cap de Creus and the Albera, near to the fishing villages of Port de la Selva, Cadaqués and Colera, where you can discover their history and culture, their gastronomy and their magnificent landscapes of the Costa Brava.
Llançà it’s near Figueres too, where you will find restaurants, shops and the incredible Dali’s museum. Also you can visit the rustic village of Perelada and they amazing Casino, and the little villages of the Alt Empordà whit their famous vineyards with D.O Empordà.
This aparment it's located in the seafr
neighborhood_overview:
This fabulous apartment is located in the urban centre of the Port’s zone, in the familiar seaside village of Llançà, where you can do different sea activities (Kayack, sail, diving, windsurf, etc..) ant mountain activities (GR92, mountain and sea routes, the Santiago path, dolmen, Sant Pere de Rodes monastery…)

This little village is between the Cap de Creus and the Albera, close to seaside villages like Port de la Selva, Cadaqués and Colera, where you can discover their history, their gastronomy and their beautiful and amazing natural landscapes.

Llançà is near Figueres town where you can visit the Dali’s museum and the Figueres shops. It is near to Perelada and its wonderful Casino.

name: El Sorrall 3. 1 bedroom apartment. Sea Views
description:
The ´Apartments El Sorrall´ are the type of apartments for clients who want to have a quiet or family holiday by the sea. A place for our clients to feel at ease. They are located in the quiet but touristic town of Blanes, in the Costa Brava. An ideal place to spend a family vacation by the sea and only a stone's throw away from the beach. All the apartments have a balcony with spectacular views of the promenade and beach.

The space
El Sorrall is a building with several types of apartments, in this case the one bedroom apartments are for two persons. The building has an elevator for easier access. There is a bedroom with 2 beds. Complete bathroom with sink, toilet , bidet and bath . Electric boiler for the hot water system. American Kitchen with refrigerator, two electric cooking hobs, extractor fan, microwave and sink. Dining room with sofa for three persons , table with three chairs and a flat screen TV. Balcony with a table and two chairs.
The apartments
neighborhood_overview: These apartments are only 300m away from the center of Blanes and its immediate surroundings and everyday facilities: supermarket, bakery, daily fruit and vegetable markets, butchers, and other small shops. Also, within the vicinity there are facilities such as a sports hall, children´s playground, parking, etc.
host_about:
Hola, som la Montserrat i en Richard.

Sóm cunyats i gestionem els apartaments EL SORRALL des del 2011. 
Ens agrada que la gent que vingui a visitar-nos es senti com a casa i passin unes bones vacances.

description:
New and bright apartment in Lloret de Mar. Perfect for a romantic evening, weekends, holidays! Аvailable WiFi. It features a pool in the common part of the building. Near the beach Fenals and within walking distance city center.

The space
New and bright apartment in Lloret de Mar (for 1 - 2 people)

Guest access
- Cozy living room with bed (160x200 cm), TV 48", DVD player, dining table and chairs, cupboard; including baby crib if needed. The room with elegant decor features lots of natural light and ventilation, panoramic view of the playground.
- Electric kitchen fully equipped with all the necessary implements to cook during your stay: fridge, oven, microwave, kettle, coffee maker, sandwich maker and washing machine.
- Bathroom with bath, hairdryer.
- Internet Wi-Fi.
- Has common pool of the building.
- 1st floor, exterior, Southeast; two elevators.

Other things to note
* Arrival at the apart
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the popular district of Fenals, is a quiet comfortable area to access and close to everything:
CAPRABO supermarket, Carrefour-EXPRESS, DIA, CONSUM; Fruteria, pharmacy, cafes, restaurants, souvenir shops and beach accessories, playground, weekly market (Tuesday), bus (to go to Blanes, Barcelona, Girona, Figueres and etc).
Close to all major attractions of Lloret:
• beaches, variety of water sports, diving, sightseeing boats;
• discos, games and Casino Lloret;
• aquapark (from the bus station takes a free bus);
• dolphinarium;
• playground "Gnome Park";
• karting "GO KARTS Lloret" (from the bus station takes a free bus);
• Botanical Gardens of Santa Clotilde, with a magnificent view of the sea.
Perfect to be near the beach Fenals (400 m) and within walking distance of the city center, you can enjoy the nightlife in the center and walk back to the apartment.

name: SANT CARLES 7 Fantastic apartment in the seafront
description:
Fantastic apartment in the seafront.

The space
This cosy apartment is located at the urban zone of the Sant Carles, of the coast and familiar village of Llançà, where you can do a lot of aquatic activities (Kayak, snorkel, sailing, fishing, windsurf, etc.) And mountain activities (hiking, the GR9, the Sant Jaume path, discover dolmens in the zone, visit the great monastery of Sant Pere de Rodes...)
This little village it’s between the Cap de Creus and the Albera, near to the fishing villages of Port de la Selva, Cadaqués and Colera, where you can discover their history and culture, their gastronomy and their magnificent landscapes of the Costa Brava.
Llançà it’s near Figueres too, where you will find restaurants, shops and the incredible Dali’s museum. Also you can visit the rustic village of Perelada and they amazing Casino, and the little villages of the Alt Empordà whit their famous vineyards with D.O Empordà.
This ground floor is in the Port zo
neighborhood_overview:
This fabulous apartment with sea views it’s located at the calm zone of Sant Carles in the familiar seaside village of Llançà, where you can do different sea activities (Kayack, sail, diving, windsurf, etc..) and mountain activities ( GR92, mountain and sea routes, the Santiago path, dolmen, Sant Pere de Rodes monastery…)

This little village is between the Cap de Creus and the Albera, close to seaside villages like Port de la Selva, Cadaqués and Colera, where you can discover their history, their gastronomy and their beautiful and amazing natural landscapes.

Llançà is near Figueres town where you can visit the Dali’s museum and the Figueres’ shops. It is near to Perelada and its wonderful Casino.
host_about: Somos una agencia inmobiliaria con mas de 50 años de experiencia en el sector turístico y especializados en alquiler vacacional. Nuestro objetivo es claro: que cada cliente se sienta como en su propia casa! Ofrecemos una atención personalizada y profesional, capaz de gestionar cualquier incidencia en el menor tiempo posible. Lejos de las inmobiliarias totalmente impersonales, nuestro trato y proximidad son nuestras señas de identidad. Esperamos conocerte y poderte ayudar en tus próximas vacaciones!

name: Las flores 3B, Begur, Costa Brava
description:
Semi-detached house located in 'les flors'-urb. Residential Begur-Costa brava. The complex is made up of 16 cases combined with a community pool

The space
In the heart of the Empordà region, the town of Begur and its municipality form one of the most wonderful places on the Costa Brava. Bounded by the Gavarres massif and the sea, with an area that extends inland to the foot of the mountain and the other open to the most beautiful seafront of the coast, the municipality of Begur, along with the small town of Esclanyà and the coves that make it up, form a set and a unique landscape environment.
Holiday home for up to 8 people. Located in the Urb. 'Residencial Begur' in a small community of bungalows, called 'les flores', with communal garden and pool for 17 homes, all homes have in addition to their private garden with direct access to the community area. Quiet location.
Twin house located in the complex 'les flors'-urb. Residencial Begur-Costa brava cons

name: Pretty Villa in Spectacular Setting with pool
description:
A countryside haven with in easy reach of the shimmering Costa Brava. Situated within the national park of Les Gavarres, aside a picturesque, medieval village, the villa has breathtaking views and spectacular walks. Enjoy traditional features with modern comforts, pool, garden & donkey.

The space
The situation is idyllic and unique. I don't think there is any other property in the area that can boast such a tranquil setting and be in walking distance of 2 of the best and affordable countryside restaurants in the area. To be by such a pretty but quite medieval village while in a national park is pretty amazing. The house is not "Ikead" it has taste, character and charm. The garden in beautifully planted and the pool at 11m, a perfect size. It really is a fantastic base to explore the medieval villages of Emporda, the beaches of the Costa Brava and the whole of Catalonia in general with the mountains, Girona, France and Barcelona also just a day trip away.
neighborhood_overview:
This area is known for its beaches, its food, stunning countryside, medieval villages, cycling, mountains and art.

A Gastronomic Extravaganza
There are various Michelin starred restaurants and many wonderful off the beaten track, local, authentic, affordable eateries. We owned a restaurant ourselves and can advise you on the best places to eat. There are 2 wonderful local restaurants just within walking distance.

Surreal Art
The area has been known for its ceramics since roman times and one can visit the nearby town of La Bisbal for ceramic shopping and the Friday morning, outside food market is delightful.

We are in the centre of the Dali triangle, with his wife Gala's eccentric castle in neighbouring Le Pubol and Figueres and Cadaques an hour or so away by car.

Surrounded by beautiful medieval villages such as Pals and Peretallada, you can spend a lovely morning at markets and cafes or go back further in time and view the exce
host_about: We love travel, art, design and cooking. We love creating and hosting delicious feasts at home.

name: Appartement vue magnifique sur mer
description:
Dans une petite résidence de 2x7 appartements équipée d'une grande piscine centrale 10mx5m et parking privé.
Loue à la semaine du samedi 16 heures au samedi suivant 10 heures studio entièrement équipé pour 3 personnes avec magnifique terrasse de 3mx3m dominant toute la baie de Rosas. L'une des 30 plus belles baies du monde au classement de l'UNESCO.

The space
Studio très lumineux avec sa baie vitrée de 3 metres de large.
Carrelage gris clair au sol peinture blanche murs et plafond.
Salle de bain relookée et remeublée en 2017 (Les photos de la salle de bain ne sont pas à jour).
La terrasse ombragée grace à un store banne est très agréable à vivre avec sa vue panoramique surplombant la plage de Canyelles et dominant toute la baie jusquà Estartit et les iles Medes, son salon en résine,son grand barbecue plancha à gaz,sa chaise longue,son relax vous invitent à la détente et au farniente...

Guest access
Une place de parking
neighborhood_overview:
Résidence située pratiquement au sommet du Puig Rom ( + 200mètres ).
D'ou la vue exceptionnelle ( voir les commentaires)
D'ou la fraicheur relative en été ( - 3 degrés environ par rapport à Rosas)
D'ou le calme , loin du brouhaha de la ville de Rosas bien que distante de seulement 2 kms.
A pied depuis la résidence,une très jolie balade à pied au milieu des ruines d'un site Visigothique dominant toute la baie de Rosas avec une vue superbe sur le Canigou.
Quartier très résidenciel.

description:
Apartment in a quiet street in the center of Sant Antoni de Calonge, 50 meters from beach

100 m2 arranged to accommodate up to 8 people (5 beds and a double sofa bed)

Suitable for persons on wheelchair: on street level, with wide corridors and doorways

3 bedrooms (2 double, 1 with bunk bed)
2 bathrooms with shower
Living room with 1 double sofa bed
Satellite TV, Internet WiFi
Private parking for 1 car

The space
Sant Antoni combines a rich medieval history with modern day facilities, offering an ideal place to relax, either on the beach or in the mountains. It lies 2 km away from Palamós, along the seashore path, offering the visitor exceptional views of our coasts.

The beautiful winding path along the "Camino de Ronda", will also take you to Playa de Aro. During the walk, you will be able to sit down and rest on any of the terraces and enjoy the sunshine, even during the winter months.

In
neighborhood_overview:

Sant Antoni combines a rich medieval history with modern day facilities, offering an ideal place to relax, either on the beach or in the mountains. It lies 2 km away from Palamós, along the seashore path, offering the visitor exceptional views of our coasts.

host_about:
Hello,

We are a family who own a number of apartments and houses
-  Costa Brava, Spain (town of Sant Antoni de Calonge and town of Palamos)

We speak fluent English, French, Danish, Spanish, Catalan, German and Mandarin Chinese.

My father is a diplomat, so we have lived and traveled extensively around the world. We enjoy meeting travelers and try our best to make your stay as enjoyable as possible.

We have contracted cleaning and maintenance staff, available to solve any issue that may come up during your stay, as soon as possible.

Generally Ana (in Spain) will be the ones to meet you at the property and provide tips about the area (she can advise on activities, restaurants, shops...). 

We enjoy good food and wine, sailing (and may be able to take you out on a boat trip locally depending on the dates of your visit), scuba diving, skiing, go-karting, adventure sports in general, entrepreneurial ventures, football, art and architecture, handicrafts etc.

neighborhood_overview:
Vall-llobrega is gelegen in de directe omgeving van Palamós een stadje met een regionale betekenis. Er is altijd leven, met de vissers-, jacht- en commerciële haven. Vele restaurants en tapas barretjes zijn het gehele jaar geopend. Palafrugell, Platja d'Aro, Girona en Barcelona zijn zowel per auto als per openbaar vervoer vanuit Palamós te bereiken.
In de omgeving zijn vele prachtige en goed onderhouden golfbanen die de echte golfer zeker als uitdagend zal betitelen.
Vall-llobrega grenst aan het natuurgebied "Les Gavarres" waar heerlijke wandelingen, of fietstochten kunnen worden gemaakt. Voor de sportfietsers is de omgeving zeker uitdagend en bijzonder. Vele wielrenploegen hebben in onze omgeving hun winter trainingskamp daar de omgeving veel verschillende hoogteverschillen en vlaktes kent.

Enjoying life, playing Golf in the marvelous climate of Spain. Like to be in the neighborhood of the sea and woods where we can walk the dogs on a daily basis. Culture is important to us. Barcelona and Figueres and other places are nice to visit.

name: 13 Calle Santa Maria In the heart of old Cadaqués
description:
In the heart of old Cadaqués, between the sea, 100 meters away, and Santa Maria Church, with its baroque altarpiece 23 m high, this family house can accommodate up to 10 people. Built on two floors, it has a large patio where between sun and shade you can have lunch and take a nap. On the second floor, a bay window overlooking the Riba Pitxot with its famous arcade painted by Dali, Picasso and many other painters who made Cadaqués their place of inspiration.

The space
This is an old house bought by my family in the 1950s when fresh water arrived by tanker. The current kitchen is installed in the old cistern. We tried to maintain the house in its original appearance by equipping it with a kitchen and modern bathrooms.

Guest access
The house is entirely up to you.

Other things to note
It is not possible to reach the house directly by car.
We advise you to park at Port-Alguer while you carry your luggage inside.
neighborhood_overview: The house is located in the old Cadaqués next to the Santa Maria church to visit for its altarpiece, near the town hall where often floats the Catalan flag and offers a beautiful view of the whole bay. This area is full of craft shops and small restaurants. The beach of Port-Alguer is a hundred meters where Ribat Pixot is famous for its arch and its view of the church and its tapas bar.

name: Rustic "Mas" farmhouse Emporda/Costa Brava/Girona
description:
Our wonderful rustic "Mas" farmhouse full of character in the quiet and serene Gavarres Nature Park/Baix Emporda between Palamos and Mont Ras near Palafrugell and Calella... far from the maddening crowd but just a stone's throw away from the beaches of Castell, La Fosca, Cala Estreta, etc on the Costa Brava.
Fully furnished & equipped by default, for 13 GUESTS.
However there is room, if necessary, for 2 more guests for an extra guest fee.

License # HUTG-017243

The space
Mas Cabré is a typical Catalan "mas" (farmhouse) built in 1842, according to the date chiseled on the front stone archway. However, it's been documented that a building of some kind already stood there in the 15th century. That's not surprising, since human presence in the area dates from prehistoric times and several dolmens and other Megalithic carvings can be found on the property or close to it.

During our renovations of Mas Cabré, we've kept its rustic, simp
neighborhood_overview:
Mas Cabre is all about location, location, location! You feel like you are far away from everything, almost in the middle of nowhere.

It is situated in the Gavarres Nature Park which is included in the European Union's Natura 2000 Network of protected areas whose goal is to ensure the long term survival of Europe's species and habitats in a sustainable manner.
The nearest house is 1 km away.
However you can see the sea from the house and the town and beaches of the Costa Brava are only minutes away.

Located in the beautifully scenic Baix Empordà region, in Catalonia, Mas Cabré belongs to the municipalities of Vall-Llobrega and Forallac, an area rich with history, great food and sports activities.
From there, you can visit old medieval towns or go to the beach; you can indulge in lunch or dinner by the sea or surrounded by nature; or you can visit a local winery and experience a wine tour.
And let's not forget bicycle trips, sailing, fishing
host_about:
I am a native New Yorker but have lived more years in Barcelona than in New York.

neighborhood_overview: Originally a fishing village, Calella has become a small town where urban growth has been strictly controlled so that the original charm of the town has not been affected. The beach is very picturesque with several coves. Instead of high-rise apartment blocks, general emphasis is placed on small, well-planned spaces with gardens and trees. Calella has the characteristics of "the perfect place" for many people, large enough to have excellent facilities, including good restaurants, bars and shops, but small enough to avoid organized travel.

name: ★ CoastalVillas - Villa Bella Vista ★stunning view
description:
A beautiful villa on a quiet spot with fabulous sea views and a great vacation house for one or two families! Villa Bella Vista is situated in a beautiful residential bay with fantastic views of the sea, two beach areas and the Santa Cristina chapel. The secluded beaches can be reached by foot (15 minutes) or by car (two minutes).
Private pool with sun loungers, terrace with exterior dining table and pergola, BBQ and free wifi. A/C in all bedrooms.

The space
A beautiful villa on a quiet spot with fabulous sea views and a great vacation house for one or two families!

Villa Bella Vista is situated in a beautiful residential bay with fantastic views of the sea, two beach areas and the Santa Cristina chapel. The secluded beaches can be reached by foot (15 minutes) or by car (two minutes).

This villa has been tastefully decorated and provides all amenities for a careless and enjoyable stay.
Shopping and restaurants in Blanes are close
neighborhood_overview:
Blanes is located in the region of Catalonia, on the Costa Brava , 60 kilometers north of Barcelona airport .

Once a small fishing village, Blanes still retains some of its original charm ; The complex has a four kilometer stretch of coastline with sandy beaches and small rocky coves , most of which are equipped with water sports and other tourist facilities.

Moving away from the seafront you will find evidence of a town steeped in history, with ancient monuments , churches and buildings still standing as reminders of past colorful Blanes. The medieval castle of Sant Joan offers spectacular views over the harbor , beach and town.
In late July it marks the international fireworks competition , an impressive sight that can be seen from the beach every year.
host_about:
We are a small family run business. Since 2001 we focus on the seasonal rental of villas and apartments that meet our high standards. Location, equipment and decoration are of high importance to us. We hand-pick all our properties to ensure they meet our quality standards and to offer you a unforgettable dream holiday!

Our experienced team speaks spanish, catalan, german, english, french and dutch and will be more than pleased to assist you in your travel arrangements. 

Hope to host you soon!

name: Beautiful apartment in the old town
description:
Completely renovated respecting the original design of the spaces , the apartment perfectly combines the comfort and luxury of modernity with the charm of the old items .

The space
Spacious , comfortable, quiet and with a special charm, this apartment is located in a traditional building of the old town of Girona . Completely refurbished to offer all the comforts of today's architecture and design, has a modern kitchen, two bathrooms and two fully equipped rooms.

The hydraulic mosaic floors , its high ceilings , the classic woodwork doors and windows, provide all the spaces special warmth and personality.

Both the master bedroom which has its own bathroom , and the double room have natural light. The first and the living room have large windows that open onto a balcony above the Rambla .

Guest access
The apartment is fully equipped with:
heating
fridge
kitchen
microwave oven
washer
Hair dr
neighborhood_overview: On the Rambla de Girona, one of the most beautiful and popular city streets full of shops , bars and restaurants ; the apartment is located in the old town , 5 minutes walk from the Cathedral, the Jewish quarter and 10 minutes from the ancient city Wall. Also, being next to the river that separates the old part of the new part of the city , its just a 1-minute walk from the picturesque houses of Onyar river and the main shopping streets.
host_about: Our only objective is to ensure that your stay is even better than you imagined. We are Oscar from Barcelona and Maria from Girona, we married in 2013 and we have 2 wonderful children. Also, together we started Flateli, a little group of properties we love to manage to host our guests and make them feel like home. Ask anything you need and we will make our best to get it for you!

name: Chambre privée et petit déjeuner pour 2 personnes
description:
Réservez une chambre indépendante du reste de la maison avec sa propre sale de bain privée et sa propre entrée depuis le jardin.
Vous pourrez profiter du jardin, de la cuisine (jusqu'à 21:00). Aussi, des vélos sont mis gratuitement à votre disposition, et vous pouvez profiter de la piscine. Le petit déjeuner est également inclus dans le prix.

The space
Ce n'est pas un logement luxueux ... Il séduira les voyageurs ainsi que tout ceux qui aiment la quiétude et les rencontres. C'est une chambre simple, propre, commode. Parfaite pour dormir et se reposer.

Guest access
Les voyageurs pourront profiter de toute la maison, ainsi que de son jardin, de ses chaises longues, de sa piscine et des vélos qui sont fournis.
C'est la meilleure adresse pour un séjour calme et agréable.

Other things to note
Située à l'entrée d'Empuriabrava, l'accès y est facile et très simple à trouver.
neighborhood_overview: C'est un quartier très calme ou s'y trouve le golf d'Empuriabrava. (Pitch and Put). Un supermarché s'y trouve également.
host_about: J'aime tout et tout le monde... Je suis français mais je vis en Espagne depuis 2012. J'adore ce pays et ses habitants. Je parle français et espagnol. J'essaie d'apprendre l'anglais... :-/ Je suis jovial, sportif et heureux. Je vis très simplement et j'adore ça.

host_about:
LLevo dedicandome 25 años al alquiler turístico. Me importa la buena relación con propietarios y huéspedes. Mi experiencia y empatía hace que tanto unos cómo otros quedan contenos y vuelven cada año a alquilar conmigo por que hay buena relación! 

Ac ceso a mi despacho El Tura: 

Llegando a Barcelona & Girona, si toman la NII, a la altura de Orriols, hay el cruce de l’Escala -  Empuries ( a la derecha) si toman la Autopista AP7/E15, por favor salen por la Salida 5 “L’Escala – Empuries”.  Llegando a la L’Escala por la Gi 623, encontrarán lo puntos giratorios de St. Martí d’Empuries  y del Camp dels Pilans, siempre tendrán que tomar la dirección Riells – Montgó. A la llegada de la población, como referencia encontrarán un puesta de la Cruz Roja, el supermercado Champion y una torreta de los bomberos. La dirección de la agencia el Tura es Avda. Montgó, nº 21ª.

Acces a mon agence el Tura

En arrivant de France, par l’Autoroute AP7/E15, vous prennez la sortie 5: L’Escala – Empúries. Si vous prennez la Route Nationale II (aprés Figueres) il ya la sortie ver l’Escala, pour la route C252. En arrivant a l’Escala, il y a les ronds  points de St. Martí d’Empuries et del Camp dels Pilans, il faut prendre toujours direction  Riells – Montgó. En arrivant, vous aurez comme points de reference la Croix Rouge, le supermarché Champion et une tour de sourveillance des Pompiers. L’adress de mon agence El Tura c’est Avda. Montgó, nº 21ª.

name: T4 Front de mer Vue panoramique.
description:
Blanes, Costa Brava. Appartement pour famille T4 tout confort avec ascenseur en front de mer. Pieds dans l’eau ! Grande terrasse équipée pour repas en toute détente face à une superbe vue mer panoramique ! A proximité à pied du centre-ville et des activités.

The space
Appartement T4 pour famille en front de mer avec ascenseur sans vis à vis. Pieds dans l’eau ! Superbe vue mer panoramique ! Grande terrasse équipée pour repas sympas en admirant la vaste plage de sable surveillée et nettoyée tous les jours. 1,5 km de promenade au bord de la plage.
Tout confort : Salle de bain équipée d'une baignoire avec kit douche, sèche cheveux, lave-linge, toilettes, séchoir à linge. Cuisine équipée d'un micro-ondes, four, frigo/congélateur, et toute la vaisselle nécessaire (casseroles, poêles, couverts, verres, assiettes ) et produits de ménage. Séjour équipé d'un canapé, table avec chaises, TV écran plat, lecteur DVD, radio, livres, magazines et jeux de société mis à dispo
neighborhood_overview:
Tous commerces à pied + boutiques et restaurants. Marché local fruits et légumes tous les jours. Marché touristique le long de la plage chaque lundi.
Départ du bateau devant l’immeuble pour excursions dans les criques voisines. On peut s'y baigner et y passer la journée. Visite de la côte en bateau jusqu'à la frontière. Arrêt de bus du réseau communal à 80m.
Très beau jardin botanique surplombant la mer. Nombreuses animations sur place ( location pédalos, jetski, parachute ascensionnel...). Attractions à proximité ( bowling à 2km. Parc aquatique Waterworld à 6km. Spectacle de dauphins et parc aquatique Marineland à 5 km, pistes de karting à 5km...)
Port de pêche et plaisance, criée aux poissons au port chaque après midi en semaine.
host_about:
Bonjour,
Nous vous proposons cet appartement avec une vue très agréable sur la longue plage de Blanes. Dans un environnement familial, vous y apprécierez la proximité de la mer, le soleil, les excursions et les délicieuses spécialités espagnoles.
Nous accueillons avec plaisir les familles souhaitant profiter du bel environnement de la Catalogne.
Nous sommes à votre disposition pour répondre à toutes vos questions et vous permettre de passer un agréable séjour sur la Costa Brava.
 Gérard

neighborhood_overview: Located on the peninsula of Cap de Creus, Cadaqués is one of the most emblematic places of the Costa Brava Girona. Its rocky coastline, beautiful beaches and tour coves, is one of the main attractions and the incredible landscape that holds the Natural Park of Cap de Creus. At the bottom of the bay of Cadaques is its historic, Mediterranean air and deep sea flavor. Source of inspiration for painters and artists of international fame for decades, this kernel today enjoys an intense cultural life, attesting its many museums and art galleries, most notably the Casa-Museo Salvador Dalí. Cadaqués is the ideal starting point for the rest of the Alt Empordà, full of historical places, surprising natural areas and abundant archaeological sites

neighborhood_overview: Es una zona muy tranquila.
host_about:
LLevo dedicandome 25 años al alquiler turístico. Me importa la buena relación con propietarios y huéspedes. Mi experiencia y empatía hace que tanto unos cómo otros quedan contenos y vuelven cada año a alquilar conmigo por que hay buena relación! 

Ac ceso a mi despacho El Tura: 

Llegando a Barcelona & Girona, si toman la NII, a la altura de Orriols, hay el cruce de l’Escala -  Empuries ( a la derecha) si toman la Autopista AP7/E15, por favor salen por la Salida 5 “L’Escala – Empuries”.  Llegando a la L’Escala por la Gi 623, encontrarán lo puntos giratorios de St. Martí d’Empuries  y del Camp dels Pilans, siempre tendrán que tomar la dirección Riells – Montgó. A la llegada de la población, como referencia encontrarán un puesta de la Cruz Roja, el supermercado Champion y una torreta de los bomberos. La dirección de la agencia el Tura es Avda. Montgó, nº 21ª.

Acces a mon agence el Tura

En arrivant de France, par l’Autoroute AP7/E15, vous prennez la sortie 5: L’Escala – Empúries. Si vous prennez la Route Nationale II (aprés Figueres) il ya la sortie ver l’Escala, pour la route C252. En arrivant a l’Escala, il y a les ronds  points de St. Martí d’Empuries et del Camp dels Pilans, il faut prendre toujours direction  Riells – Montgó. En arrivant, vous aurez comme points de reference la Croix Rouge, le supermarché Champion et une tour de sourveillance des Pompiers. L’adress de mon agence El Tura c’est Avda. Montgó, nº 21ª.

description:
Pequeño apartamento planta baja delante del mar dentro de zona privada ajardinada muy tranquila y bonita. Su situación es ideal para acceder a pie a las mejores playas de Calella de Palafrugell. y relajarse con la naturaleza, a pocos minutos del centro a pie.
Dispone de cazuelas ,sarten cazos y paelleras. Pero no se suministran ningun tipo de alimento ( aceite, sal, pimienta)como figura en la pagina por error de la configuracion por parte de Airbnb y por higiene

The space
Es un apartamento pequeño pero en un lugar bonito y pintoresco, donde puedes oír el rumor del mar y el canto de los pajaritos. sin duda para disfrutar de la naturaleza, además no hay mucha de gente, es muy tranquilo. Esta en una zona donde se accede al camino de ronda

Guest access
El inquilino deberá abonar la tasa turística correspondiente a su estancia: 1€ por persona y noche, hasta un máximo de 7 noches. Los menores de 16 años están exentos de esta tasa.Junto a
neighborhood_overview: finaliza el transito de vehiculos y continua el camino de ronda que  bordea toda la costa Brava,hay unas vistas al mar preciosas, y llegas en 10 minutos a la cala de "El Golfet" Ademas esta a 100 metros del Hotel Sant Roc, que organiza noches de Jazz y cantadas de Habaneras en los meses de verano

Apartamento de 75 m2 muy cerca de la playa les Tonyines. Edificio de construcción moderna con ascensor. Hallamos 2 dormitorios dobles uno de ellos con cama del matrimonio y otro con dos camas individuales. Salón comedor (con TV 40' LCD y sofacama) con amplio ventanal que accede a la terraza amueblada con vistas al mar. Cocina americana y totalmente equipada. Vitrocerámica, microondas, lavavajillas, lavadora, frigorifico y utensilios de cocina. Air acondicionado. No hay problemas de aparcamiento. No se aceptan mascotas. name: Costa Brava - estudio con jardín
description:
Estudio de dos habitaciones, salon-cocina, baño y gran jardín. Comparte parcela con nuestra casa, aunque es totalmente independiente. Dispone de acceso privado, espacio para 4 personas y situado a 10 minutos en coche de la playa. Sin lujos pero con todas las comodidades necesarias.
Rodeado de montañas , bosques y a 10 minutos en coche del mar.
Aceptamos mascotas educadas, (no se pueden quedar solas en el interior del apartamento), disponen de un amplio patio con sol y sombra a su disposición.

The space
Es un apartamento sencillo y comodo, sin grandes pretensiones, pero con lo básico para tener una estancia muy agradable. Es una construcción aislada de nuestra casa que se encuentra dentro de nuestra parcela. El apartamento es totalmente independiente, dispone de jardín propio, zona de aparcamiento y acceso directo a la calle. No tiene zonas comunes con los propietarios, por lo que la privacidad esta garantizada. Esta situado en una urbanización muy tran
neighborhood_overview:
Urbanización muy tranquila en plena naturaleza dentro del PEIN de Les Gabarres y cercana a todos los servicios. Es necesario un vehículo. El carril bici esta al lado de la Urbanización y también tenemos multitud de opciones de actividades en plena naturaleza como trekking, btt, escalada, vias ferratas, kayak, etc...
Supermercados, centro medico, policía, bus, a 4 minutos en coche.

New cozy apartment located in Fenals, a quite quarter from Lloret quarter called Fenals. The apartment is 45 square meters and has one living room and one big bedroom with double bed. There is a 15 sq meters terrace where have nice breakfasts and fresh dinners at night.

The Fenals beach (the nicest beach of Lloret) is just 800 meters away, less than 10 minutes walking. The village center with the shopping and disco area is also 800 meters away so it's close but also quite to sleep at night. The surroundings have all the services available (restaurantes, supermarkets, rent a car, pharmacy...)

name: Renovado Apt. a 600 metros de la playa y tiendas
description:
Apartamento reformado en Abril '20 de 55mts2, con un gran comedor, 2 habitaciones dobles, baño y cocina completas y 2 amplias terrazas. Dispone de zona exclusiva de parquing comunitario. La playa está igual que el centro, a 10min andando, cerca hay un parque de atracciones infantil (PPS PARK -wifi gratuïto-). A 800 mts hay una zona comercial (OSCAR) con supermercados, quioscos, tiendas de ropa, etc.
Situado en una zona tranquila de día y más concurrida de noche (hay una discoteca cerca).

The space
Apartamento muy comodo e ideal para familias.
Habitaciones amplias con armarios empotrados y con lavadora y terraza para tender la ropa (se incluye jabon).
También se facilitan sábanas y toallas sin cargo adicional.
Todas las estancias són exteriores. Bien ventilado y muy soleado con toldos y sin aire acondicionado.
Gran comedor con acceso a una terraza en dónde podréis disfrutar de las comidas al exterior.

Guest access
El
neighborhood_overview:
Se encuentra a sólo 10 minutos andando tanto de la playa como el centro.
Dispone de zona de parquing (gratuita) comunitaria en el recinto del apartamento.
Este año 2022 han abierto una discoteca justo al lado del parquing, por lo que, por la madrugada, se puede escuchar ruido cuando sale la gente. El parque comercial cierra a la 1am, y a veces también llega un poco el ruido de las atracciones.

neighborhood_overview:
Empuriabrava sur la Costa Brava, est une agréable zone résidentielle connue également sous le nom de "La Venise espagnole", en raison des quarante kilomètres de canaux qui la parcourent (dont 24 navigables).
C'est la plus grande MARINA d'Europe, avec plus de cinq mille points d'amarrages.
C'est un endroit où il fait bon vivre et qui dispose de plusieurs kilomètres de belles PLAGES.
Quelques activités/équipements/prestations à Empuriabrava (par ordre alphabétique, liste non exhaustive) :
Bowling, équitation, excursion en bateau, golf, gymnase, karting, kite-surf, location de motos, location de vélos, location d'embarcations, mini-golf, plongée sous-marine, randonnée pédestre, tennis, train touristique...

Pour les amoureux de la nature et des balades :
- Promenade sur les CANAUX
Pour admirer les canaux de la ville et ses berges, vous pouvez louer de petites embarcations. Aucun permis n'est nécessaire pour en devenir les capitaines !
- La
host_about:
Bonjour à tous !
Nous sommes Jana et Jean. Nous disposons de deux appartements à Empuriabrava. Nous souhaiterions vous faire profiter de cette belle région de la Costa Brava et de son agréable climat. 
Jana est une femme adorable, très féminine, avec une bonne éducation, sérieuse et consciencieuse dans sa profession mais, surtout, avec une belle joie de vivre ! 
Pour ma part, je crois pouvoir dire que suis quelqu'un de simple, ouvert, travailleur mais sachant également bien profiter des beaux moments de l'existence. 
Petit inventaire à la Prévert de ce que nous aimons : lecture, soirées entre amis, self-defense, guitare, fruits, vin blanc de Sancerre, Histoire, musique, séries policières, documentaires, langues étrangères...

name: Casa Punta Milà. Private garden and  communal pool
description:
Our house is a two floor semidetached house in a quiet, charming village, L'Escala, in the middle of Costa Brava.(www.lescala-empuries.com) Modern style and very comfortable with free internet wifi access. It is child friendly. Back garden with porch, private garden and direct access to the community garden and pool. Recent build front yard with few amenities.

The space
Our house is a two floor semidetached house in a quiet, charming village, L'Escala, in the middle of Costa Brava.(www.lescala-empuries.com) Modern style and very comfortable with free internet wifi access. It is child friendly. Front and back garden. Comunity garden area with big pool for relax. The house has got 3 double bedrooms (one of them in the ground floor), 2 bathrooms, a sitting room, a dining room and a full equipped kitchen.
Terrace with porche with lovely views to the garden. Very quiet area. You can park the car in front of the house
We provide bed linen and towels
neighborhood_overview:
Quiet neighbourhood between Riells Beach and Montgó Beach .
Restaurants, shops and supermarkets within a 1 km.
host_about:
Hello,
We are Jordi and Carol, married with two daughters.
Our property is a recent and modern semidetached villa for 6 people equipped with every comfort.  It is located between Riells and Montgó, so you can easily reach walking, shops, restaurants and of course the beach. (10 minutes walking).
The house has a private garden and has access to a large communal garden with beautiful pool. Ideal for families with children.
L'Escala is a charming village and  great located in the middle of Costa Brava. You can enjoy our pleasant and sandy beaches such as Montgó Beach, located in Montgó bay, 5 minutes driving from home.
Ideal for people who love all kind of water sports. Near home you can find spots for windsurfing and kitesurfing (El Riuet and Sant Pere Pescador), diving and kayak (Montgó),  deep sea fishing...  Lots of cycling paths for discover the surroundings as well.
The area offers cultural activities such Greek ruins in Empúries, Dali museum (25 km far), a visit to the medieval town of Girona is a must. Barcelona is 120 km from here.
On the other side if you love nature, there are protected natural areas near L'Escala, such as "Parc natural dels Aiguamolls de l'Empordà" (ideal for bird watchers, "Parc Natural del Cap de Creus" and "Parc Natural del Montgrí".

We like traveling around the world and discover wonderful places, but when we are here we enjoy the peaceful and relax that the property offers.
Guests should treat the property and the belongings with respect. 
Guests should respect the rules of the neighbourhood.

Bed linen included
towels included
Bathroom towels included
Wi-fi included

If our place fits with you, we will be pleased to be your hosts and do all the best so you enjoy your stay in Costa Brava.

name: Cal Bisbe, Charming Rural Holiday House
description:
Cal Bisbe house, is situated over two floors connected by an external staircase. It has a patio and outdoor swimming pool, decking and a patio. It has 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and 2 kitchens equipped with dishwashers. It has a barbecue and wood-burning fireplace, and we provide coal and firewood for your use. The house has heating, air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. Especially suited for the elderly or people with reduced mobility, the entire ground floor is on the same level and there are no steps.

The house faces the south, protected from the northern wind, with sun all day long, as well in winter as in summer.
Outside there is a yard where you can park your car, a swimming-pool with lawn around, and a resting zone protected by a wooden pergola that allows to enjoy better the time you spend outside.
On the ground floor, you find the yard, with wooden table and chairs, to have your meals outdoor, a vestibule, the kitchen, a bathroom and a large living room with firep
neighborhood_overview: Cal Bisbe house, it's a very beautiful rural whole house for rent. Well equipped and comfortable, it is an ideal place to spend time relaxing or on holiday with family or friends. The house is situated in the small village of Capmany (Girona), which is part of the Alt Empordà region and makes up the northerly part of the Costa Brava. It is very well connected and close to the beaches or mountains, it is also close to the city of Figueres and the shopping areas on the Spanish/French border.

neighborhood_overview:
LA ZONA . LA GARROTXA
La Garrotxa disfruta de dos tipos de paisaje totalmente distintos, peculiares y de una gran belleza.
Por una parte la Zona Volcánica, 40 volcanes y coladas de lava que crean un paisaje absolutamente único y por otra parte el Espacio de Interés Nacional de la Alta Garrotxa, que abarca el Valle del Rio Fluvià hacia el Norte, donde el paisaje cambia radicalmente volviéndose abrupto y escarpado, y donde podemos observar espacios naturales de una especial belleza.
Haz clic aquí para modificar.

Calles peatonales llenas de vida local con sus cafés y tiendas y restaurantes
Edificios modernistas

Museos
Fiestas tradicionales.

Volcanes (10-20 mins.)
Parque Natural de la Zona Volcánica de la Garrotxa
Hay más de 40 volcanes inactivos en la zona y diversas coladas de lava, formando un paisaj

name: AF-2 Beautiful house with swimming pool in Calella
description:
Beautiful house with swimming pool in Calella de Palafrugell

The space
Beautiful semi-dettached house near the centre of Calella de Palafrugell.

The house has 3 floors and it's located in a nice residence with swimming pool in Calella de Palafrugell.

Entrance to the house by the private garden.

On the ground floor there's a big living-dinning room, tastefully decorated with an exit to the terrace, a spacious fully quipped kitchen and a toilet.

On the first floor, there's a bathroom and 2 double bedrooms, one with 2 single beds and terrace, and the other one with a single bed (sofa-bed).

On the last floor, there's also a bathroom and 2 double bedrooms, one with a double bed and a terrace with beautiful views, and the other one with 2 single beds.

The house is 750 meters to the beach and 500 meters to all the services and the center of the town.

Capacity for 7 people.

To access
neighborhood_overview: Originally a fishing village, Calella has become a small town where urban growth has been strictly controlled so that the original charm of the town has not been affected. The beach is very picturesque with several coves. Instead of high-rise apartment blocks, general emphasis is placed on small, well-planned spaces with gardens and trees. Calella has the characteristics of "the perfect place" for many people, large enough to have excellent facilities, including good restaurants, bars and shops, but small enough to avoid organized travel.
host_about: We are the agency Immo Cala Marquesa, local agent in Calella de Palafrugell and Begur, and your contact for all questions or problems you might have during your stay in Calella.

host_about:
Real Estate Agency Pals and Begur
Sa Punta Costa Brava is a letting and estate agency helping tenants, landlords and buyer with properties since 1975. We arrange the selling, renting or management of apartments and houses on the Costa Brava, especially in the Playa de Pals and Begur.
Sa Punta Costa Brava is committed to delivering a high level of expertise, customer service, and attention to detail to holiday rentals and luxury properties sales and providing a professional service to clients and buyers alike. Also, we ensure high standard property maintenance in your absence.
Make your house or holiday apartment on the Costa Brava your home away from home.



Agencia Inmobiliaria en Pals y Begur
Sa Punta Costa Brava es una agencia inmobiliaria desde 1975 referente en la venta y alquiler de apartamentos y casas en la Costa Brava, especialmente, en la Playa de Pals y Begur.
Especializados en la venta y alquiler de casas y villas de lujo, Sa Punta Costa Brava es reconocida en el sector por su exclusivo servicio de atención personalizada. Ofrecemos un servicio a medida para cada cliente (conductores, baby-sitters, chefs, etc.) en nuestras propiedades en alquiler, asistencia jurídica y patrimonial en todo tipo de transacciones inmobiliarias o venta de propiedades y servicio de mantenimiento de las propiedades para los clientes que viven en el extranjero.

name: El Jardinet: 50m Montgó beach*Parking*Garden*Airco
description:
El Jardinet is a very nice family apartment (renovated May 2018) that accommodates comfortably 5 guests.

It has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, terrace, a private garden, a patio and parking on premises. Wifi and A/C available.

It is located only 50 meters walking from the beach of Cala Montgó, one of the best sand beaches in Girona-Costa Brava.

The space
El Jardinet is a very nice familly apartment that accommodates comfortably 5 guests.

It has a large dining and sitting area, equipped with Airco and TV. It has direct access to the terrace where to enjoy breakfasts and other meals, a private garden with sun loungers and an indoor patio.

The rest of the apartment has 2 complete bathrooms with walk-in showers and 3 bedrooms: 1 double bed, and 3 single beds. All bedrooms have fitted-in closets. Bedding sets, blankets and pillows are provided.

Air conditioning (cooling/heating system) is available in the dining-sitti
neighborhood_overview:
Within a radius of 100 mt around the apartment you will find a large supermarket with a fresh bakery, a newsagent shop, and plenty of good restaurants that serve from tapas, light meals, pasta and pizzas to excellent Mediterranean cuisine: Can Miquel, Restaurant l’Oreig, Bar Waikiki and Pizzeria Sibaris to mention some.

A public tourist train, "the Carrilet" is available during the summer season and links Sant Martí d´Empúries with l´Escala, Riells and Montgó. It operates from 15th June to 30th September from 08:00 until 24:00, with one train every hour. Price is approx. €2 per journey.
host_location: Sant Joan de les Abadesses, Spain
host_about:
I am Cristina, from a small mountain town in the Catalan Pyrenees. We have 2 kids and as a family we like to travel and discover new places.

We have one apartment in Cala Montgo for 5 guests called "El Jardinet" and one in L'Escala town center, for 2 guests, named "Maranges". Both properties are in fantastic locations!

We are not professional landlords but we love hosting and recommending places for guests to explore. 

We also do our best to ensure the apartments are in great conditions so you just have to come and enjoy.

name: Duplex in Camprodon
description:
Beautiful duplex located in the center of the town. The location is very quiet and peaceful and perfect for people who love mountains, nice landscapes and extreme sports. It is also logistically well located as you have a big supermarket (ESCLAT) at 50 meters from the duplex. You can also get to the primary street by 5 minutes walking. For the ones who love hiking we have some guides in the duplex with different trekking. Vall ter ski slope is 15 minutes by car from Camprodon.

The space
The apartment is very well located, in addition to having capacity for six it is located in a very quiet area of ​​the village. The apartment has some very cozy features, in addition to the possibility of using your fireplace in colder months. The proximity to the ski slopes and the multitude of footpaths make it a village with a special attraction.

Guest access
All areas of the apartment can be accessed since renting is delivered in full terms and the hosts
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is very close to the center but not in the very center(it is a 5 minute walk). So, being a more residential area you will enjoy the tranquility of this without  the car or people noise. However, its close proximity to the center allows you to enjoy all its benefits and have access to all the services needed for a trip.
host_about: Fun, reliable,sensible,helpful, enthusiastic,amazing...and much more!

name: 6p Apartment with Wifi and airco, 260 m from beach
description:
Lovely apartment with a large terrace. Panoramic view up to Castell Montgrí! There are three bedrooms. Everything is well maintained. The terrace is facing South, inside is air conditioning. The large beach of Riells with the great boulevard is at only 260 meters.

The space
The apartment lies on the third floor. The living room is large enough for 6 adults. From the living room starts a terrace. It is large and wide. Enjoy the sun together in summer time or in winter time! It is facing the south and gives a panoramic view from Puig Sec on the left, to Castell Montgrí on the right. During the Tramuntana (strong wind from the north) you are well protected on the terrace.
In the living room is a flat screen tv. The room is air conditioned. The first bedroom has a double bed and is air conditioned as well. The bathroom has a shower and toilet. Great to rinse of after a day at the beach.
The kitchen is very well equipped. There is a ceramic hob, microwave, o
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is close to Platja Riells. The promenade on the beach is lively with nice shops, little cafes and restaurants. The historic center of L'Escala is located within walking distance. A little further next L'Escala are the famous excavations of Empúries. These are very worth to visit. If you like horseback riding is also possible, there is a riding school at the entrance to the village boundary. In the cultural field is a lot to do with its Museo Dalí Figueres, Girona with its beautiful cathedral and a little further course Barcelona with Gaudi.
Sports, there's a lot possible. Watersports Sea like canoeing, jet-skiing, scuba diving or snorkeling. Excellent bike paths to the beach of Sant Pere Pescador, where you can kite surfing, wind surfing or just soaking up the sun.
Moreover Girona Airport is 40 minutes from L'Escala.
host_about:
Hallo reiziger, 

Even voorstellen: Wij zijn Vakantiehuis l'Escala.
We verhuren huizen en appartementen in l'Escala, l'Estartit en Pals waaronder de onze. l'Escala is vooral in de zomer druk bezocht maar wij willen het ook buiten het hoofdseizoen promoten. Er is hier zoveel meer te doen dan op het strand liggen. Cultureel en sportief een waanzinnig gebied. Probeer het eens uit!
Hopelijk beleeft u er net zoveel plezier als wij!

Andries ter Hennepe
Oprichter van Vakantiehuis l'Escala

Bonjour voyageur,

On se présente: Vakantiehuis l'Escala (Maison de vacances à l'Escala)
Nous louons des maisons et des appartements à L'Escala, l'Estartit et Pals, y compris la nôtre. L'Escala est particulièrement fréquentée en été, mais nous voulons aussi promouvoir en dehors la saison principale. Il y a tellement plus à faire ici que de bronzer sur la plage. Culturels ou sportifs, ceci est une magnifique région. Essayez le!
Nous espérons que vous ferez l'expérience d'autant de plaisir que nous faisons!

Andries ter Hennepe
Vakantiehuis l'Escala


Hello traveler,

Let us introduce ourselves: We are Vakantiehuis l'Escala.
We rent holidayhomes in L'Escala, l'Estartit en Pals. L'Escala is especially crowded in the summer but we like to promote it also outside the main season. There is so much more to do here than lie on the beach. Cultural and sporting activities, this is a very diverse environment. Try it out!

Hopefully you will experience just as much fun as we always have!

Andries and Inge ter Hennepe

Close to all major attractions of Lloret:
• beaches, variety of water sports, diving, sightseeing boats;
• discos, games and Casino Lloret;
• aquapark (from the bus station takes a free bus);
• dolphinarium;
• playground "Gnome Park";
• karting "GO KARTS Lloret" (from the bus station takes a free bus);
• Botanical Gardens of Santa Clotilde, with a magnificent view of the sea.

name: Apartment Golf Mar
description:
The Golf Mar apartments are located close to the port of L´Escala on the beautiful Costa Brava.
The Golf Mar apartment complex has a communal pool located in well kept gardens with plenty of sun. The apartment is on the first floor and consists of one bedroom with double bed and one bedroom with two single beds.
The double bedroom has access to the rear balcony overlooking the pool and gardens.
This apartment boasts a large lounge, dining area and kitchen area which has access to a balcony overlooking pine woods and with a sea view of the bay of Roses.
The beach of Riells is located at about 15 mins walk.
The beach front has numerous bars and restaurants. Local supermarket are also located here. In peak season a funfair is located at the far end of Riells beach which is approx 20 mins walk. The old village of L`Escala approx a further 15 mins walk.

neighborhood_overview:
Calonge is gelegen aan de Costa Brava , in de provincie Girona en op een paar kilometer van Palamos en Palafrugell. De plaatsen Calonge en Sant Antoni de Calonge zijn nog weinig bekend bij de buitenlandse toeristen.

Sant Antoni de Calonge ligt op ongeveer 1u50 van de Franse grens . Het ligt ten zuiden van Cap de Begur ( 20 km ) ten noorden van Sant Feliu de Guixols (16 km ) en 45 km van Girona. Het is verdeeld in twee delen , Sant Antoni de Calonge is de kust met grote zandstranden en Calonge is het historische centrum met een middeleeuws kasteel .

In de afgelopen jaren verdiende Sant Antoni de Calonge het etiket van " destinal of Family toerisme" door zijn vele activiteiten tijdens de zomermaanden. De omgeving van Sant Antoni de Calonge is uitzonderlijk met grote zandstranden , kleine baaien , en veel fietsroutes in de vlakte van Calonge midden tussen de wijngaarden. Richting Palamos , is er het strand van Es Monestri wat doorloopt in het strand van Sant Antoni e
host_about:

Tijdens uw vakantie zijn wij uw aanspreekpunt en kunnen je alles vertellen over de mooie omgeving, heerlijke restaurantjes en de mooiste stranden!

The space
The house is suitable for up to 8 people. It is a large house in a beautiful countryside; the house is equipped with a large swimming pool (50 sqm.) and a beautiful garden. Also there is a wide space for enjoying dinning al fresco.
Other features of this property include large open kitchen, large dining room space for celebrations and a comfortable living room with a nice fireplace.
One baby cot available under request.
